movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: Xia Luo, who was about to step forward to kiss Ma Dongmei, was suddenly pushed aside by Ma Dongmei. Xia Luo, startled, quickly pulled back and said, "Mom, I'll burn some extra paper for you later."

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: The next day, the school broadcast announced the suspension of Da Chun, Meng Te, and Zhang Yang. Da Chun was furious, and Meng Te and Zhang Yang were also quite angry.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: The next day, the school held a flag-raising ceremony, and the students sang the national anthem in unison. Xia Luo, with a guitar strapped on, stood on the stage and played the instrument while singing.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3300_3480.text: Jin Tao Nian, who was waiting outside, looked up and saw the signboard of the wonton shop. He then walked into the shop and looked around. The boss, Sofian, was busy clearing the tables. Jin Tao Nian stood at the door, staring at the counter.

Zhang Yijun, who was about to be caught, suddenly kicked out, hitting Li Yanming in the left eye. Li Yanming, in pain, let go of the chain. Zhang Yijun took the opportunity to kick him in the left shoulder. Li Yanming, clutching his shoulder, quickly crawled to the ground.

Zhang Yijun, with a fierce expression, charges at Li Yanming, but Li Yanming counters with a punch to his stomach, sending him flying. Zhang Yijun struggles to get up, but Li Yanming, with a fierce glare, charges again. This time, Zhang Yijun is ready, dodging the punch and throwing Li Yanming to the ground with a shoulder throw.

Zhang Yijun, lying on the ground, was caught by Li Yanming's foot in her chest. She tried to get up but failed, and Li Yanming, panting, straddled her. After a few attempts, Li Yanming finally managed to pin Zhang Yijun down. He grabbed her hair and lifted her up, only to see her fall to the ground again.

Zhang Yijun, in pain, tried to break free from Li Yanming's grasp, but was held tightly. She kicked at Li Yanming's abdomen, but Li Yanming used his weight to pin her down. Zhang Yijun, unable to break free, kicked at Li Yanming's knee, but Li Yanming grabbed her ankle and pulled her up, slamming her onto the ground.

Zhang Yijun, who was kneeling on the ground, suddenly grabbed Li Yanming's neck. Then, with a swift kick, she knocked down the two policemen who were rushing to help. At this moment, Li Yanming's face turned pale, and his eyes bulged. The police hurriedly stopped the oncoming crowd.
Li Yanming, who was shot in the face, was being dragged back by the police. A police officer said, "Officer Li, keep calm." Li Yanming tried to break free from the police dragging him back.
The police arrived, and Li Yanming was taken away. The police said, "Take her back."
Jin Taonian, who was parked on the side of the road, was watching everything unfold.

Zhang Yijun, who was about to get into the car, saw Jin Taonian sitting in the driver's seat. She rolled her eyes and got into the passenger seat. Jin Taonian watched her with a cold expression, then started the car.
The scene shifts to the night view of the city's main street, with tall buildings on both sides and a constant stream of vehicles. Cui Minho sat alone at a street stall, drinking and eating.
Cui Minho said, "Shen Meijing, since we left the temple, you've been telling us to turn off our phones."

movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.text: Cui Minho said, "Park Yuzhe, if we wait any longer, we won't make it."

Cui Minho stood aside, watching the grandmother and Ming Jian, feeling a pang of longing for his own family. He lowered his head, turned off his phone, and continued to watch them.

Cui Minho said, "Let's go, let's go."

The host said: "Ladies and gentlemen," "please put down your chopsticks and spoons," "and prepare to welcome the arrival of the new emperor and empress."
At this moment, Park Yuzhe and Cui Minho slowly walked over. Yun Hee-sun was holding Ming Jian, and Grandmother was holding a gift box. Park Yuzhe called out, "Team Leader."
Yun Hee-sun looked at Park Yuzhe and said, "Didn't we agree on tomorrow morning?"
Park Yuzhe apologizes, "Sorry, Mrs. Cui, the timing is tighter than we imagined."
Yun Hee-sun said, "You weren't invited to this banquet, you came uninvited. Do you understand manners?"
Cui Minho said, "Wife."
Cui Minho looked at Park Yuzhe and said, "Sorry, wait for me outside." Park Yuzhe looked puzzled, but Cui Minho didn't explain further and walked away without looking back.

Cui Minho took the flowers from Grandmother's hands, gently placed them on Ming Jian's body, and then took Ming Jian from Grandmother's arms. Grandmother watched as Cui Minho and Yun Hee-sun walked away with Ming Jian.
Cui Minho said, "Wife," and Yun Hee-sun turned to look at him.

Yun Hee-sun said, "Before we got married, I already knew everything you sacrificed for the country." Cui Minho looked at Yun Hee-sun, and Yun Hee-sun continued, "I was going to give this to you tomorrow." Yun Hee-sun handed a handkerchief to Cui Minho and said, "Remember to buy it back." "Don't worry about us."
Cui Minho said, "Ming Jian, I leave him to you."
Yun Hee-sun looked at Cui Minho with a smile, and the next day, the fire truck arrived at the hotel.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: Cui Minho said: "We've been walking around all day." "What's going on inside?" Shen Meijing looked at the two of them, then lowered her head in confusion. The three of them sat in silence.

Shen Meijing said: 'Our DC8 has already alerted half the underground intelligence world in the UK, US, China, and the Middle East. Because the weapons were seized, he said that at least three groups would carry out terrorist attacks in Hong Kong unless we turn over the police officer who killed the Middle Eastern buyer the night before. He will then tell us where the Equator is.'
Park Yuzhe said: "That's simple." "Explain it clearly to Officer Fan." "What's the issue with trading Officer Fan for information?"
Cui Minho said: 'You're saying to betray a Hong Kong police officer, to trade Officer Fan for uncertain intel?'
Cui Minho was stunned. He looked at Shen Meijing, then at Park Yuzhe, who was drinking tea. Cui Minho took a sip of beer, and Shen Meijing stared at him intently.
Park Yuzhe said: "Officer Fan is also a police officer. A cop's duty is to sacrifice themselves for the nation if needed. Were I in his position, I would also consider doing the same at all costs."
Cui Minho said: 'This isn't a matter of life for life; it's about trust, integrity. How is what you're suggesting any different from what those criminals would do?'
Cui Minho looked at Park Yuzhe, then at Shen Meijing, and finally raised his glass and clinked with Shen Meijing's.

Park Yuzhe said: 'If sacrificing one person can save many lives, don't you think it's worth it? Director, didn't you say we must retrieve the weapons even if it means using force? I've already mobilized many people. Why are you hesitating now?'
Cui Minho said: "I told you to prepare just in case!" Park Yuzhe looked at Cui Minho, Shen Meijing looked at Park Yuzhe, and then Park Yuzhe stood up and walked to the other side.
Park Yuzhe said: 'If that informant is reliable, the Equator passed right by us. Can we face the generals with this? How can you live with yourself?'
Shen Meijing said: "Wait a moment." "Can I say something?" "Director Cui Minho, your decision is very immature." Shen Meijing looked at the two people in front of her, her eyes filled with anger.
Fan Jiaming got out of the car and walked towards the repair shop, Park Yuzhe followed him and observed the situation inside.
Fan Jiaming said, "Please, keep your phones on, and quickly put on your translators. Your weapons have been compromised. Everyone return to the intelligence center now."
Meanwhile, Jin Tao Nian, who had just entered the airport, received a call from an unknown number. The person on the other end said, 'The Chinese weapon expert will arrive within thirty minutes.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_4560_4740.text: The long-haired man said: "I'll upload a file to you later" "After you see the breaking news" "Send the file to CTRU"

The scene shifts to the airport, where Jin Taonian is sitting in the waiting area. He looks around, then takes out his phone to make a call. After connecting, he puts the phone to his ear, waiting for the call to be answered.

Zhao Zhiren's eyes were cunning, and he nodded at Song An, who was inserting his earphone. Song An took off his glasses and put them back on again, looking at Zhao Zhiren.

Zhang Yijun, who was handcuffed, was led by the police out of the hall. She kept her head down, not daring to look at Li Yanming. Li Yanming, who was not far away, followed her gaze. At this moment, Li Yanming also noticed the man in black approaching them. He quickly stepped forward to block him.

The interrogation room was pitch black, Zhang Yijun was sitting in the interrogation chair, with Li Yanming standing beside him. The lights suddenly turned on, and Zhang Yijun was sitting at the interrogation table, with Li Yanming standing beside him.
The man in the green suit said: "Her blood has been sent for analysis""Results will be out in eight hours""Then we'll know if she is the missing flight attendant"

The scene shifts to the racecourse, where a large crowd has gathered. The race is about to start, and the horses and jockeys are in position. Li Yanming walks through the crowd, heading towards the seats.

Li Yanming walked into the interrogation room with a bottle of water, placed it in front of Zhang Yijun, and then turned to look at the monitor.

Li Yanming said: "How old are you" "Twenty-four, twenty-six"

Li Yanming stood up and said: "You have a choice"

movie101_6969128872847770149_4740_4920.text: Li Yanming said: "You can spend a lifetime in prison" "Or" "Help me find your boss"
Li Yanming looked at Zhang Yijun and said: 'Don't talk about becoming a tainted witness or reducing your sentence. Just give him up, and I'll send you wherever you want to go.'

Zhang Yijun looked at Li Yanming with a face full of confusion. She blinked and turned to the side, while Li Yanming turned his head to the other side, not daring to look at her. Zhang Yijun turned back to look at Li Yanming, who avoided her gaze once more.
Zhang Yijun was pinned face down on the ground, her long hair covering her face. Li Yanming took a bottle of water, poured it over Zhang Yijun's head, and then removed her clothes.

Zhang Yijun was then tightly bound to a chair. Li Yanming poured the remaining water from the bucket over her head. The water flowed down her body, but it did not ease the tension; instead, it made her look even more miserable.

Li Yanming took off his coat and threw it behind Zhang Yijun, then took a hair dryer and pressed it against Zhang Yijun's head. The hair dryer was pushed back and forth on Zhang Yijun's head, and Zhang Yijun was electrocuted and fell to the ground. Li Yanming said: "Think about it clearly"
Li Yanming and Policewoman ran to the iron gate, Policewoman opened the iron gate, and Zhang Yijun was handcuffed to the shelf in the corner.

"The police bomb disposal unit is already on the scene." "As you can see, a large number of horse racing fans..."

Zhang Yijun said: "Actually, I have another way" "According to a reliable informant in Hong Kong" "He will tell us the whereabouts of Equator" "As long as we hand over the cop who killed the Middle Eastern buyer the night before last" "That would be Officer Fan"
Li Yanming asked: "Is your informant reliable?"
Zhang Yijun: "It was this informant who" "Told us the real location of the arms deal the night before last."
Officer Fan: "I was the one who killed him."
Zhang Yijun: "I don't really want the Hong Kong police to hand someone over."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4920_5100.text: Shen Meijing said: "I don't really want the Hong Kong police to hand over the person, just saying that if we approach him, maybe we can find Equator."

She is dressed in a tight-fitting business suit, carrying a briefcase in her left hand, and pulling a suitcase with her right hand. She walks with large strides, exuding an air of confidence.

Zhao Zhiren said: "I told Li Yanming, once you guys come back, we will sort things out, then I will leave. Actually, the sooner we send off DJin Taonian, the sooner Hong Kong will be safe. You’ve done what you should, it also counts as helping us."
Zhao Zhiren, with a smile, looked at Park Yuzhe, then turned and walked away. Park Yuzhe stood there, stunned, watching Zhao Zhiren's departing figure.

Zhao Zhiren, who was standing not far away, watched Park Yuzhe walk into the reagent room without saying a word. He then slowly walked to the one-way glass on the right, looking at Park Yuzhe who was busy inside.
The scene shifts to the parking lot, where a black car slowly drives in. The car stops next to a sedan, and a bodyguard gets out of the car, opens the trunk, and a man in a suit steps out of the car.

Mr. Cui said: "Although it's in a graphite box, it absolutely must not have any more severe impacts, handle it with the utmost care. Team Leader Park, I have something to handle, please assist."

movie101_6969128872847770149_5100_5280.text: Zhao Zhiren, with a face full of satisfaction, watched as Li Yanming walked away. Li Yanming, with a face full of anger, walked straight to the tunnel entrance.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.text: Li Yanming: "Overtake them," "Weiye, catch up quickly." Li Yanming ordered his subordinates to chase after the sedan. Cui Minho asked: "What's wrong?"

Cui Minho: "There is one more thing, very important. You pass the news into the intelligence community. DC8 is back in our hands and has already left port. So no one will hurt Hong Kong anymore."

movie101_6969128872847770149_5460_5640.text: Park Yuzhe shouted, "Cui Minho!" Park Yuzhe and Cui Minho exchanged glances and then ran in the same direction.

Cui Minho and Park Yuzhe ran out of the room, supporting each other as they fled. Cui Minho was hit in the leg, and the two of them moved forward with difficulty.

Cui Minho, who was shot in the abdomen, was leaning against the car door. Park Yuzhe, with a gun in hand, checked the rear seat and then turned to look at Cui Minho. Seeing Cui Minho's condition, Park Yuzhe put down the gun, and the two clutched the wound on Cui Minho's abdomen together.

Cui Minho, who was about to rush out, was grabbed by the collar by Park Yuzhe and slammed into a car. Park Yuzhe, who was about to get into the car, was grabbed by the collar by Cui Minho and thrown to the ground.

Cui Minho, who was pressed to the ground, used his strength to throw him off. Park Yuzhe immediately got up and continued to fire, but Cui Minho ducked under the car, rendering Park Yuzhe's shots useless.

The report stated that during the Japanese occupation of China from 1937 to 1945, comfort stations like the one in the village were built by the Japanese to serve as military brothels for the comfort women. The comfort women were mostly girls and young women taken from various countries, including China. They were forced to work there, enduring extreme physical and mental hardships. Grandma Li Ailian, with a hunched back, walked to the door with the help of a cane. She looked at the sky, then at her watch, and finally at her daughter-in-law. She sighed and slowly walked back inside.
The scene shifts to the village where Grandma Li Ailian lives, with the sound of cicadas echoing.
The old woman said, 'That one has kittens now, has children now, look at its bulging belly.'

Grandma Li Ailian said, "I saw it was thick around the waist a few days ago."
Grandma Li Ailian said, 'Just these past few days.'

Daughter-in-law Li Xiuping said, "It might be the neighbor's cat. It's the one that had a litter of kittens. The neighbors don't care, so it came to my house. Initially, five cats came to my house. My mother-in-law fed them every day. I even told her off, 'You don't even want to cook for yourself, why are you feeding the cats?' 'If nobody feeds them, won't they starve to death?' she replied."
Daughter-in-law Li Xiuping said, 'Even if she doesn't eat, she feeds the cats. Sometimes she cooks for the cats first. She gives the best food to the cats, and she eats what the cats don't.'
The cat, seeing Grandma Li Ailian's movements, quickly ran away. Grandma Li Ailian, feeling helpless, waved her hand and went back inside.

Grandma Li Ailian called the cat and said, 'Cat, come.' 'Where are your kittens? Why didn't you bring them over?' 'When your kittens come, pick up and eat.' 'Your kittens haven't eaten yet.' 'Eat slowly.'
The two cats were frolicking in the yard, and Grandma Li Ailian was watching the TV, humming a tune.

The camera shifts to the living room, where an old TV set is showing a children's program. The boy in the program is singing a song. In the shabby room, the boy is sitting at the table doing homework while Grandma Li Ailian is sitting on the bed knitting a sweater.

movie101_7021829520667705869_4500_4680.text: The room was still as it was when Grandma Li Ailian left, with only the radio playing softly.

Grandma Li Ailian continued, "She comes out when the children start playing in the yard," "The children gather around her calling 'Grandma, Grandma,'" "They are all happy playing with her," "When she comes out, she plays with them and sometimes cooks something for them," "The children happily surround her, dancing and singing."
Aunt Wang said, "Actually, my mother-in-law is quite happy," "The hardships she endured are beyond our imagination," "So now, seeing her in good health, our whole family is very happy."
The night fell, and the house was still lit.
Grandma Li Ailian continued, 'But in other villages, many women were raped, giving birth to children with big eyes and big noses.'
The scene shifts to the ecological landscape of the Liu County region, which is a vast expanse of lotus fields.

The old man sat on the edge of the bed, fanning himself with a palm fan, watching Grandma Li Ailian. He took off his jacket and handed it to Grandma Li Ailian, saying, "You're working hard, sister-in-law."

The woman, wearing a baseball cap, sat next to the old man and said, "A journalist from Beijing once wrote a story about a Japanese man who found out he was Japanese. How did you feel when you found out you were Japanese?"

Grandma Li Ailian said, "My younger brother (from the same mother but different father) said I was Japanese," "He wanted to kill Japanese people and said he would pay a hitman," "He would pay to have me killed, so I closed the door and said kill everyone."
The auntie asked, "Your brother said he wanted to pay a hitman to kill you, why?"

The two sat at the door, with a crack in the middle. The female volunteer said, "Didn't Zhu Hong (a volunteer) say he would help you find a wife in Japan?"
The three of them sat on the ground, each holding a camera, ready to start shooting. The old woman in the corner was eating, seemingly oblivious to the activity in the courtyard.

movie101_7021829520667705869_4680_4860.text: Wei Shaolan, who was eating, paused for a moment, then continued to eat without any expression. The two men then left the house.

Wei Shaolan sat on a bench in the corner of the room, fumbling with the dates in hand, not knowing how long he had been there. The dates were already wrinkled and dry, much like Wei Shaolan's aged and weathered life.

Chen Houzhi said, "If these elderly people are no longer around, the historical facts will still be there. Many will ask, what about their descendants, how will their families live? I encounter these elderly people frequently, and it always makes me feel a certain way seeing them so happy, so carefree. However, once this topic is broached, their faces drop, and tears start to fall. So, apart from what is needed for the lawsuits, we try to ask questions on that matter only. If it isn't necessary, we do our best to keep them happy."

Chen Houzhi took out his phone from his pocket, dialed the number, and waited for the call to connect. He put the phone to his ear, and the voice of the other person came through, saying, 'Chen Houzhi, you've worked hard since you were a child, and now you are a forest ranger.'
The two of them laughed and started to eat the meal.

The camera switches to the girl's voice saying, "When I come to this granny's house, I help her clean, give her massages, and carry water. When she washes clothes, I help hang them up. I don't feel that she is a pitiful victim. It's as if she were my own grandmother. I like her; some grannies are sadder than others, but some are not as heartbroken as I thought. They're all very warm-hearted. They feed us and then care for us when we sleep at the granny's house. When I was a child, my grandmother took care of me and my brother, so I like grannies a lot!"

movie101_7021829520667705869_720_900.text: Volunteer An Shihong said: "And the number of victims is quite large, and they are still enduring a lot of pain up to this day. When I saw how difficult their lives are now, I wanted to let more people know about these grandmothers as soon as possible."

"When I saw Grandmother Park Cha-soon still living in a house with no roof, like a warehouse," "I wanted to turn it into a very warm home."

Volunteer An Shihong said: "We want to let more people know about her through this house renovation project for the elderly." "So that people will spread the word, from ten to a hundred to a thousand." "We will promote these activities in the United States, Korea, and Japan." "Those who visited her home wanted to express their feelings." "They wanted to give the grandmother their most precious things." "So they prepared these items." "Such as thermal underwear, scarves, Korean music, and maps."

The scene shifts to a small alley, where a woman is walking and talking on her phone. She stops and says, 'Then there are the three of us. My husband, me, and my mother. That's seven people in total.'

The old man walked out of the house, leaning on a cane.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1020_1200.text: The scene shifted to the brightly lit street, with pedestrians strolling along the road, and colorful flags hanging from the buildings.

The street was crowded with people, and a group of streetwalkers gathered at the entrance of a brothel, calling out to passers-by for business. A car slowly drove by, and a streetwalker said, 'Stop, stop, stop! Brother, I'll take you for a good time.'
Fang Jie said, "Come on, come on! I've booked the second floor! Come down! Relax a bit."
Fang Jie was about to leave when a group of people stopped him. Fang Jie asked, 'Where are you going?'
The scene shifts to a street lined with European architecture. A car slowly approaches, then suddenly accelerates and passes by the camera.

The rain outside was drizzling. A car slowly drove into the yard, and Tang Hexuan got out of the car. He walked towards the house with his umbrella, and the people waiting in the yard turned their attention to him.
The car stopped in front of a big house, and the black-clad men in the back got off the car one after another.

The group of men in black, now including Tang Hexuan, followed closely behind. The five of them walked into the Palace of Versailles with a sense of pride and arrogance. The interior of the Palace was luxuriously decorated, with carved gilded wood and jade-like marble. The group walked in step, with Fang Jie leading the way, followed by the others.

Tang Hexuan stepped forward and said, "Fang Jie, it's good you're back. How do you know it was Ye Fatty? Why are there so many people in the yard? Dismiss them all."

Tang Hexuan looked at Fang Jie with a face full of regret and longing.
Fang Jie looked at Tang Hexuan, then turned and left the bathroom. The night fell, and the villa was quiet, with only a few lights shining in the courtyard.
Li Zihao drove the car out of the villa, the car was hit and stopped by a wooden stake.
Li Zihao, who was sitting in the passenger seat, got out of the car and ran into the rain.

Li Zihao, who had been leaning against the car door, immediately opened his eyes wide and looked back. He saw a figure with a hat and a trench coat walking towards him. He quickly ducked under the eaves of the house, but the person walked straight up to him.
Li Zihao, who was lying on the ground, struggled to get up and then walked towards the opposite side of the street.
Li Zihao was captured and brought to a dilapidated school.

Li Zihao was in extreme pain, his body uncontrollably twisting under the needle's attack. He opened his mouth wide, his teeth clenched, his eyebrows furrowed, his hands holding his foot tightly, shaking it in the water. The rain poured down, and Li Zihao was in so much pain he couldn't speak, only able to make a pained hissing sound.
Li Zihao, who had been waiting at the entrance, saw Fang Jie running towards him and immediately raised his gun to shoot at him.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.text: Li Zihao, who had been waiting for a long time, had already fallen asleep leaning against the wall. The rain was still falling heavily, and the children huddled in the corner of the room, their eyes filled with confusion and fear.

Fang Jie said: "Dragons produce dragons and phoenixes give birth to phoenixes", "The sons of mice will fight", "No, no mice", "I tell you", "Everyone on the Bund knows", "We are a perfect match", "You are a crow in the sky", "No, no crows", "You are a phoenix flying in the sky", "I am on the ground, this..."
The coachman said, 'Young master, Miss is coming.'

The man asked, 'Has she arrived?'
Fang Jie, smiling, waved and said, 'Laugh, laugh.'

Tang Qianqian, who had just disembarked, was also looking around. She looked at the busy crowd and the towering buildings in front of her with a sense of novelty. She walked forward with her suitcase, looking around.

Tang Qianqian, dressed in a tight suit and wearing a hat, got out of the car. She waved to the workers and walked towards Fang Jie with a smile. Fang Jie approached Tang Qianqian and said, 'You're back.'
Tang Qianqian said, 'It's been two years,' 'You haven't changed,' 'Still the same heartless person,' 'Who are these flowers for?'
Fang Jie said, 'These flowers are for you.' Tang Qianqian smiled and accepted the flowers.
Tang Qianqian took the flowers and said, "Thank you" "Let's hurry up" "I hope we're not late for the movie."
Fang Jie said, 'I've reserved the whole Cinema Palace, don't worry about being late.'
Tang Qianqian said: 'I didn't expect An Affair to Remember to premiere earlier in Shanghai than in England,' 'I'm a big fan of Hepburn,' 'I think she's both beautiful and hot.'
Fang Jie, infuriated, says, 'What the hell is that you're talking about?'
Tang Qianqian said, 'I found out you are really ignorant, I won't say more.' Tang Qianqian put the flowers in the car's back seat.

Fang Jie got off the carriage and said to Tang Qianqian, 'Let's walk.' Tang Qianqian nodded in agreement. Fang Jie led Tang Qianqian through the streets. The streets were bustling with people, and the street vendors added a lively vibe to the city.
Tang Qianqian smiled and said, "You are quite romantic now, you even arranged an antique carriage to pick me up." The two of them got on the carriage and headed to the hotel.
Fang Jie said, "Of course, who am I, I am Fang Jie."
Tang Qianqian said, 'Here is your gift.' Fang Jie took the gift from Tang Qianqian's hand, and Tang Qianqian handed the flowers to Fang Jie.
Fang Jie looked at the dog and said, 'A dog.'
Tang Qianqian asked, "Aren't you born in the year of the dog?" "Look at its appearance."

movie101_7021874945990853151_120_300.text: The scene switched to a light bulb flickering, and then Li Zihao's face appeared in the water. Li Zihao said: "Torture" "It momentarily helps me forget the pain" "Forget those unforgettable memories" "The Bund of Shanghai only brings me pain" "The organization" "Hope" "Where is it" "Oh God, please help me" "I want to escape" "I want to end all this"

Li Zihao was in extreme pain, his muscles uncontrollably twitching under the icy water. The chains around his wrists and ankles severely restricted his movements. Despite the soldiers' attempts to throw him into the water, he still clung tightly to the chains.
The raindrops hit the bare feet, causing Li Zihao to involuntarily curl his toes. The soldiers, despite their sturdy build, couldn't help but step back in fear.
The man in black was instantly kicked into the iron mesh fence behind him, and the force of the kick was so great that it even punched a hole through the fence.

Li Zihao was dragged back to the ground, and the soldier raised his baton to strike him. Li Zihao, with his head down, struggled to stand up, but the soldier took the opportunity to hit him, sending him flying again. Li Zihao got up and continued to fight back.

Li Zihao, with his upper body bare and wearing only a pair of underwear, was chained to a post. A man in a black coat held an electric baton, shocking Li Zihao whenever he came close. Li Zihao was in extreme pain, his muscles uncontrollably twitching under the shock. Despite being bare-chested, he was still wearing a pair of handcuffs. The police, wielding sticks, shouted: "Catch him!"

Li Zihao, with his upper body bare and covered in wounds, was still unyielding. He grabbed the officer's gun and, despite being shot in the abdomen, used the officer's uniform to bandage himself and continued to struggle.

The rain-soaked city was shrouded in a veil of grey, with a constant drizzle. Li Zihao, bare-chested and with his head down, ran through the rain. He was soon intercepted by a group of policemen, who quickly surrounded him. One officer raised his gun and aimed at Li Zihao's head, yelling, "Stop!" The others also raised their guns and aimed at Li Zihao. Li Zihao raised his hands in surrender, and the officers quickly approached to handcuff him.
Li Zihao was in extreme pain, his muscles uncontrollably twitching under the icy rain. The rain grew heavier, and Li Zihao's body was increasingly at risk of being electrocuted.

Li Zihao was hanging in mid-air, his body slowly falling, about to hit the ground. At this moment, he finally escaped from the first timeline's fate, and was reborn into the second timeline. The second timeline's Li Zihao was also hanging in mid-air, his body slowly falling, about to hit the ground.

The scene shifts to the sea, where a huge cruise ship sails on the sea, with a seagull flying past in front of it. The ship sails to the harbor of Shanghai, with its arrival causing a stir. The bustling city is crowded with people and vehicles, and the streets are filled with bustling crowds.

The situation in Shanghai is too chaotic these days, every day, the Suzhou River surfaces with so many bodies. Those people's faces are all decayed.'

The ensuing explosion sent debris flying, and Fang Jie was knocked to the ground. Li Zihao, who was in the rickshaw, was thrown into the air and then back to the ground. The rickshaw was also thrown into the air and then heavily crashed onto the ground.

Li Zihao, who was almost at the end of the road, saw this scene. He quickly turned back, grabbed a nearby rope, and climbed back to the road. However, the falling snow quickly covered the road, and Li Zihao had to move forward relying on his senses.

The carriage continued to race forward, and the car behind was still relentlessly chasing. Li Zihao, who was holding the reins, occasionally looked back at the pursuing car. The street was crowded with people holding umbrellas, and the horse cart had to slow down.

Li Zihao, who was holding Tang Qianqian, was about to leave when suddenly a car emerged from the side and knocked Li Zihao to the ground. The car continued to move forward, knocking over the rickshaws on the road.

The tram sped forward, and the two were soon hit by it. Tang Qianqian fell to the ground, and Li Zihao was hit and sent flying. The car continued to move forward, and the two struggled to get up from the ground.

Li Zihao was about to be hit by the car, and Tang Qianqian was also about to fall. Fang Jie quickly pushed Tang Qianqian away and then pulled Li Zihao up. Tang Qianqian looked at Fang Jie in shock, and Li Zihao was hanging on to life by a thread, barely breathing.

Li Zihao, who was holding the reins, immediately turned the carriage around and drove off in the opposite direction. Li Zihao, holding the reins, swung the long knife at Fang Jie, but Fang Jie dodged it and then threw the wooden box towards Li Zihao.

Fang Jie was about to reach the tram when he saw Li Zihao's motorcycle coming. He quickly bent down to pass through a narrow alley. Li Zihao followed closely, and Fang Jie rode up a sloped street, barely making it through.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1560_1740.text: Fang Jie and Li Zihao were fighting with the thugs on the carriage. Fang Jie said: "A little closer." Fang Jie and Li Zihao were about to reach the thugs. Fang Jie and Li Zihao grabbed the thugs' weapons and threw them off the carriage.

Li Zihao, who was originally sitting in the carriage, got off the carriage and started to run. Fang Jie, who was driving the car, got out of the car and started shooting at Li Zihao. Li Zihao ran into a narrow alley, and Fang Jie followed him into the alley in the car.

So where exactly did this armored vehicle come from?'

Da Xu was riding a bicycle, waiting for the right moment. He saw Shen Yan and Mrs. Zheng walking on the sidewalk and said, "What are you up to?"

The rice ball was filled with different kinds of ingredients, including fish roe, shrimp, and corn. She then took a sip of the soup in the other container, which had a cute little phone pick in it.
Yuan Xiaoou said while running, 'Exercise to protect the motherland! Pick up the pace!'

The scene switches to the cinema, where Yuan Xiaoou and Qi Jia are sitting in the audience eating popcorn and watching the movie. Yuan Xiaoou, with a bag of popcorn in hand, leans towards Qi Jia and starts to hum the movie's theme song. Qi Jia, with a smile, reaches out to stop the humming, but Yuan Xiaoou, not giving up, continues to sing along with the movie.

The scene shifts to a beauty salon, where Qi Jia is lying on a bed with a facial mask on. The mask is applied evenly on her face, and she is lying back comfortably on the bed. The door of the room is open, and Yuan Xiaoou is sitting on a sofa outside, reading a book.
Yuan Xiaoou, lying on the sofa, was covered with a mask by Qi Jia. After removing the mask, Yuan Xiaoou said, 'Hey, why didn’t you wake me?' 'What’s so funny? Am I not handsome enough?'
Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou and said, 'You look super handsome today.' 'Look!' 'Right?'
Yuan Xiaoou said: 'It's not about what I'm wearing today.' 'How come... They think I look very...' Yuan Xiaoou looked at the window and walked forward.

Yuan Xiaoou, who was changing clothes, heard the noise, ran out of the bedroom with a basket of clothes, and then turned back to grab something. He walked back to the living room, sniffed his armpit, and then looked down at his body.
Yuan Xiaoou shouted: 'Qi Jia, Qi Jia, come quickly, what is this thing?'
Qi Jia crawled over and said, 'Yuan Xiaoou, you’re stepping on it, you murderer!' Qi Jia picked up the turtle and said, 'Yuan Xiaoou, after all these years, are you still doing okay?'
Yuan Xiaoou asked, 'Ah, if I may ask, then what should I be called?'
Qi Jia, holding the turtle, looked at Yuan Xiaoou and asked, 'What’s your name anyway?'
Yuan Xiaoou said, 'Forget it, it’s not important anymore.' 'That turtle has been starving for four years, find it something to eat, will you?'
Qi Jia, holding the turtle, said, 'At this age, the turtle is in the prime of its life in the turtle world, food isn’t that important' 'Let’s release it and let it find a girlfriend.'
Yuan Xiaoou asked: "Is what you're wearing the trend from fashion week this year?"
Qi Jia, wearing a skirt, walked on the beach with Yuan Xiaoou, who was dressed in pants. Qi Jia said, 'I forgot to change my pants.' 'I was wondering why it felt so breezy.'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "But you’re quite fashionable, oh! Look at me, showing a bit of leg hair. Is it fashionable too?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: Yuan Xiaoou looked at the turtle, then at Qi Jia, and couldn't help but laugh. He reached out and took the turtle from Qi Jia's hand, and Qi Jia wrote the words'sea turtle' on it.

Yuan Xiaoou said: 'There is no feast that doesn't end,' 'Okay, this is your last photo shoot,' 'Strangle him,' 'Yes, pose as if you're strangling him,' 'Okay, hit, hit, hit him,' 'Kill him,' 'Don't kiss him,' 'You kiss him,' 'Are you stupid or what?'
Yuan Xiaoou, who was walking behind, suddenly appeared beside her, handed her a handkerchief, and wiped her tears. The two of them were laughing and playing on the beach.
Qi Jia said, "My lip hurts a lot."
Yuan Xiaoou said: 'Are you stupid or not?'
Qi Jia turned around and saw the turtle, excitedly exclaiming, 'It's back, how did it come back?'
Yuan Xiaoou said: 'Are you playing stubborn, huh?' 'Acting like a hooligan, aren't you?' 'I'm gonna give it another ride, it's too young and can't recognize the way.'
Qi Jia said, "I knew you couldn't bear to leave me."
Yuan Xiaoou squatted down and said, 'No, it's lost. Isn't that right, you got lost right?'
The man, seeing this, hurriedly ran over and said, 'Hey, young man, are you silly? That's a freshwater turtle, it crawled back when you threw it into the sea. Really silly.'
Yuan Xiaoou, in a panic, dropped the turtle and ran after Qi Jia, shouting, 'Are you stupid? You can't even tell the difference between a freshwater turtle and a sea turtle.'
Qi Jia said: 'You brought me to the beach,' Yuan Xiaoou laughed, Qi Jia said: 'Laugh,' 'What're you giggling at?' 'My lip hurts and you are still laughing.'
Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou, Yuan Xiaoou looked up at Qi Jia, then turned his head away, pursed his lips, and thought for a while. He turned back to look at Qi Jia, then lowered his head, silent.
Yuan Xiaoou took the turtle from Qi Jia's hand, and Qi Jia, with a mischievous grin, splashed water from the river onto Yuan Xiaoou's face.
Yuan Xiaoou said, 'Mr. Liu, you can finally go back to your parents now,' 'Once you leave don't come back.'
The scene shifts to the ecological park, Lin Shuer said to Qi Jia: 'Not bad,' 'your complexion is rosy and shiny,' 'could it be that you got the big fool to do something for you?'
Qi Jia sipping her juice said, 'I just had a good sleep, is that a big deal?'
Lin Shuer said: 'During my travels, I heard that the big fool has trained you very well, it was worthwhile to take him in.'
Qi Jia said: 'When I took him in, I had no ulterior motives at all.'
Lin Shuer said, 'Could it be that you two are the long-lost 'tears between men and women' that scares many of-age youths in the world, the pure friendship between a man and a woman?'
Qi Jia said: 'He and I have pure friendship like sisters.'

Lin Shuer said: 'You have such a'sacred beast' that 'harvests Yang to supplement Yin' at home, and you're so calm. To be honest, there aren’t many people who would give their lives and shed blood for you.'
Qi Jia hesitated and said: 'But...'

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: Qi Jia said, "But he will still leave."
Lin Shuer said, "Oh, I detect a hint of reluctance?"
Qi Jia says, 'Stop kidding, let's go have a drink.'

Lin Shuer said, "When drunk, you'll know who you love the most. When you're ill, you'll know who loves you the most. Consider the fool. Though he has countless flaws, he has one greatest merit—he is utterly guileless."
Lin Shuer, looking at Qi Jia, said, 'Such a rare quality in a man.'
Qi Jia said, "Let's go, let's go, let's go shopping."

The scene shifts to a shopping mall, where Lin Shuer and Qi Jia are in front of a kiosk. The kiosk is selling various exquisite jewelry. Lin Shuer picks up a pair of earrings and asks the clerk, Yuan Xiaoou, for help with the purchase. The two follow the clerk to the counter, and Lin Shuer picks up a diamond ring.
Yuan Xiaoou said, "Mr. Li, ah, I've bought it. Alright, I'll pick you up shortly."

The scene shifts to a shopping mall, where Qi Jia is walking out of a high-end store. A luxury car pulls up at the entrance, and the driver gets out and opens the back door. Yuan Xiaoou steps out of the car and says, "Mr. Li, take it slow."

The scene shifts, and Lin Shuer and Qi Jia are walking side by side on the street, carrying shopping bags. Lin Shuer says to Qi Jia: "Yuan Xiaoou, it's easier to give birth to twins than to find a devoted man. Even a person like Yuan Datou has a spare tire."
The scene shifts to a high-end western restaurant, where a waiter is holding a plate of food. Yuan Xiaoou takes the plate and says, "Thank you."
Lin Shuer said: "Didn't order any hearty dishes? I'm not even hoping for braised pork, twice-cooked pork, or stewed pork belly. But there should at least be a plate of stir-fried pork, right?"
The waiter said, "Sorry, our restaurant only serves health cuisine and does not offer those dishes."
Qi Jia said, "Health cuisine? Do you have health beer?"
Gui Jie: "Sorry, none either."
Qi Jia asked again, 'How about health liquor?' Yuan Xiaoou replied, 'Sorry, none either.'
Lin Shuer said, "Yuan Datou, you really squeezed out your wife's savings."
Yuan Xiaoou said, 'The food here isn't cheap at all.' 'It's all organic.' 'It's good for your body.'
Lin Shuer asked Yuan Xiaoou: "So, what's the theme of today's grand feast?"
Yuan Xiaoou hesitated and said, 'I... I got promoted to Administrative Director.'
Qi Jia, eating her ice cream, said, 'Your boss got drunk and made you the Administrative Director?'
Lin Shuer asked in shock, 'Did you sell your body?'
Yuan Xiaoou said, "What's with that talk? Do you think everyone is like you?"
Lin Shuer says, 'Stop, yesterday you were still fooling around.'
Qi Jia replied, 'Exactly.'
Yuan Xiaoou quickly explained, "It's not like that. That was my boss, we were visiting a client together. Qi Jia."
Qi Jia said, "Alright, alright, let's toast. Hopefully, you will do well in the future."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: Qi Jia raises her glass and says, "I hope you can do well in the future." She then drinks the soup in one gulp and says, "What is this? It tastes like overnight swill."
Yuan Xiaoou introduces, 'This is red date yogurt, especially good for women.'
Lin Shuer, while eating, says, 'Sir, you are truly a marvel in the world of women's therapy.'
Yuan Xiaoou says: "Actually, I have another matter today. Our boss wants me to go to Shanghai to prepare for the new branch. But the decision is up to me, I don't have to go if I don't want to."
Qi Jia looks at Lin Shuer and says: "Go, of course you should go." "Why not go?"

Yuan Xiaoou, with a face full of confusion, looks at Lin Shuer, who stares back with an enigmatic smile. Yuan Xiaoou unconsciously twists his ring finger, the very ring that Lin Shuer has been eyeing. Lin Shuer gets up to pour tea, and Yuan Xiaoou takes the opportunity to glance at her hand, only to find it empty. Lin Shuer sits back down, and Yuan Xiaoou leans in to look at her hand again, only to see the other party staring at him.

The two practiced the pronunciation of the English word'skinny' by the lake. Qi Jia said, 'Yuan Xiaoou, I really can't do this anymore.' Yuan Xiaoou replied, 'What's not possible? I'm telling you, when I go to Shanghai, you have to persist in running every day.'
The scene shifts to the next day, Yuan Xiaoou and Qi Jia are jogging together. Yuan Xiaoou says, 'I'm exhausted, running alone feels like using the strength of two people.'
Yuan Xiaoou pulls Qi Jia to the big tree where they had their first kiss and says: "Hurry up, what's there to look at?" "It's just where you had your first kiss," "nothing impressive."
Qi Jia turns to Yuan Xiaoou and says, 'How do you know?' Yuan Xiaoou looks at Qi Jia, and Qi Jia continues, 'Lin Shuer, that gossip.'

Yuan Xiaoou pulls Qi Jia to a big tree and says: "Come, I'll show you a magic trick. I guarantee you’ll never think of that person again when you pass by here. Now, stand still and close your eyes, quickly."
Qi Jia says: "Yuan Xiaoou, I'm telling you I'm scared of ghosts. If you summon something weird, I'm going to hit you!"
Yuan Xiaoou, with hands in pockets, walks up to Qi Jia and says: 'Heavenly spirits, earthly spirits, let the Supreme Elder Lord appear.'
Yuan Xiaoou, holding Qi Jia's face, looked at her tenderly and kissed her. They stood under the tree, kissing each other passionately.

Yuan Xiaoou passionately kisses Qi Jia under the tree, and they embrace each other. Yuan Xiaoou's kisses become gentle, and then they pull apart. Yuan Xiaoou supports Qi Jia's waist and leans down to kiss her again, and Qi Jia happily laughs.
Yuan Xiaoou, with a face full of worry, watches as Qi Jia turns and walks away. He stands there, unsure of what to do.

The scene shifts to a park, where the sun shines through the leaves, and two people jog past the camera. The two are in sync, running under the shade of the trees, with the sunlight occasionally shining on their faces through the leaves.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.text: The two gradually got used to each other's company, and their relationship gradually improved. They went from initial mutual dislike, to becoming indispensable to each other's lives. Yuan Xiaoou even started to introduce Qi Jia to his family. However, all of this was just on paper. In reality, Yuan Xiaoou was still living in the same old shabby room, while Qi Jia was still working tirelessly in the small diner.
Yuan Xiaoou took off his jacket and held it over Qi Jia's head, then rushed to the driver's seat and started the car.
Lin Shuer, sitting in the car, shouted: "Qi Jia, silly goose, over here, get in the car!"

Lin Shuer, with a fur coat and a backpack, got out of the car and opened the back door to put the backpack inside. Yuan Xiaoou, sitting in the back seat, looked at the two of them and said, 'You two are quite romantic, aren't you? The place is almost flooded, but you're still strolling in the rain.'

Yuan Xiaoou, who was originally leaning against the seat, turned to look at Lin Shuer. Lin Shuer, who was sitting in the driver's seat, was also looking at them. The car's navigation system started speaking.

Lin Shuer, cursing, said, 'Did you two have a fight?' 'I don't know which brain-dead twins parked their cars blocking mine, not even leaving a phone number. Just wait and see how I'll deal with them.'

Lin Shuer said, 'No, no, this won’t do. If it keeps raining like this, none of us will be able to get home tonight. I'll go out and think of a solution. If you both are going to fight, do it outside of the car, don't splatter blood all over my vehicle, it has genuine leather interior.'
Lin Shuer opened the car door and stepped out. The water on the road was still splashing, and the sky was filled with dark clouds.
Qi Jia opened the car door and got out, while Yuan Xiaoou watched her leave without any expression.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "That thing, starting tomorrow morning... You know you need to increase the sit-ups to 50, yeah?"
Qi Jia said, 'Got it. Starting tomorrow, I'll do it by myself. Just take care of yourself going to work. No need to rush every day.'
Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou and said, 'Thanks for earlier at the school.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia and said: 'I think you're getting better. You're becoming more positive and optimistic.'
Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou with a smile and said, 'I think you need to go to Shanghai.' Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia in surprise.
Qi Jia, sitting in the back seat, slowly lifted their right leg, then forcefully pulled up their trousers. The dampness on their leg was immediately absorbed by the socks and shoes.

Lin Shuer, holding an umbrella, said: "How many times do I have to tell you?" "I'm stuck on the road and can't get back." "I'm with Qi Jia." "She’s in the car." "I’m outside now." "Why are you asking her to answer the phone?" "You're the one contradicting yourself." "Where else could I be?" "Where do you think I can go in this heavy rain?"
Qi Jia, sitting in the passenger seat, looked at the wiper and said: "Where the hell is Lin Shuer that bitch? I'll go find her."

Yuan Xiaoou said, 'Don't, let me go.' 'It's raining so heavily and you're still so weak.' Yuan Xiaoou tried to open the car door but couldn't, so he had to press his head against the window to look outside.
Qi Jia said: 'The water is waist-deep.' 'It's over, it's over, what do we do now.'

Lin Shuer, holding an umbrella, sits on the ground and says: "Who's being unreasonable here?" "Who’s starting the fights on purpose?" "I’m sitting in the middle of the road in the rain." "You keep pestering and causing trouble." "Can I be gentle?"
Lin Shuer's boyfriend retorted: "Look at that filthy mouth of yours, are you even a woman?"
Lin Shuer retorts: "If I’m not a woman, then you're not a man." "I just missed two of your calls, so what?" "It’s pouring rain, I didn't hear, is that not okay?"
Lin Shuer's boyfriend retorts: "No." "I’m abroad, staying up late because of the time difference to call you." "And you? Throwing tantrums, acting like a diva, and purposely not answering my calls."
Qi Jia and Yuan Xiaoou were trapped in the car, with the rising water reaching their chests. Yuan Xiaoou asked, 'Is there no other way?'
Lin Shuer angrily said: "You shameless jerk, didn't you say you were abroad?"
Lin Shuer's boyfriend said: 'I'm destined to travel the world. Don’t think you can ride the bull and act all mighty.'
Lin Shuer retorted: 'I am mighty, so what? If you're so capable, swim over here and bite me.'
Lin Shuer's boyfriend said: "I haven't learned to swim all this time, didn't you know?" "Call the police to save me quickly."
Lin Shuer: "I won't." "I won't save you or call the police." "Float wherever you want."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "You're too heartless. Let's break up."

Lin Shuer said: "Fine, let's break up." "Whoever doesn’t is a coward." Lin Shuer and Yuan Xiaoou stood on the rooftop, shouting at each other. The rain poured heavily, and the thunder rumbled in the sky. The two of them, drenched in rainwater, were shouting at each other on the rooftop.
Yuan Xiaoou, holding the phone, said: 'The line is busy.'
Yuan Xiaoou took out his phone and said: 'Come back quickly and save us. Water is already inside the car. Hurry, hurry, hurry.'
Qi Jia looked at the rain and said: 'Yuan Xiaoou, we probably won't be able to escape, right?'
Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia and said, 'It's okay, it's okay, I’m still here. Don't worry.'
Qi Jia: 'Yuan Xiaoou, we are about to die, right?'
Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia and said: "If we have to die together, I think it's quite nice."
Qi Jia said: 'Yuan Xiaoou, I've imagined ten thousand ways to die, but I never thought it would be like this, suffocating.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: Doctor said: "The age of menopausal patients is tending to decrease." "This is called premature menopause." "I'll prescribe you a 'Dingkun Dan.'" "Back in the day, Emperor Qianlong had three thousand concubines." "It's thanks to this that they could regulate the liver, relieve depression, and maintain youth."

Qi Jia said: "You misdiagnosed." "Yeah, I'm not dizzy, you know, my head is perfectly fine; I'm not dizzy." "I'm not even married yet, and I haven't even had a child." "My mom hasn't even hit menopause." "Are you saying I'm experiencing premature menopause?" "Do you even have professional ethics?"
Doctor said: "Angry, aren't we? Feeling a bit dizzy, right? These are typical symptoms of menopause. Just like this cactus. Prickly on the outside, but the inside is still very soft."
Qi Jia said: "Soft my sister" "Prick your own head", Qi Jia took out a whistle and threw it to Lin Shuer, who was lying on the lawn, and then lay down to rest.

Lin Shuer said: "Heard you hit menopause?" "I told you before, if you don't get your period for six months, it's a bad omen." "But when you seek medical advice, why would you prick the doctor's chin with a cactus?" "Why did you leave my phone number after you pricked them?" "Is that decent of you?" "Ah, let's go."
Lin Shuer asked: "Tell me, what do you want to do tonight?"
Qi Jia, sitting in the car, says: "The night grows late with snow threatening; may I have a drink?"
Lin Shuer said: "No, I already told you I'm allergic to alcohol."

Qi Jia sits in the car and thinks: "Every year at this time" "those who are graduating" "turn the quiet summer night" "into a wild and sentimental one" "Three bottles of drink in my belly" "all my sentimentality turns into a stomachache" "Unhappy things seem to become happy"
Qi Jia said: "This wedding dress cost me five hundred yuan to rent."
Lin Shuer, sitting on the railing, said: "Look at this lack of spirit."
Qi Jia replied: "Can't get it dirty."
The two of them sat on the steps of the hospital entrance. Qi Jia held a bottle of beer and said to Lin Shuer: "I have a stomachache."
Qi Jia asked: "Stomachache?"
Qi Jia, sitting on the steps, said: "Shouldn't my heart be aching instead?"
Lin Shuer said: "You deserve it." The two sat on the steps, with Lin Shuer leaning on her friend, and her friend hugged her tightly.
Qi Jia said: "That bastard Liu Chong."
Lin Shuer said: "Chong your ass, he flew away this afternoon."
Qi Jia said: "When he left, he asked me to take good care of his turtle."
Lin Shuer said: "What turtle?" "If I were you." "I'd take the opportunity to blind him." "Pierce his mouth." "You're such a wimp."

The scene shifts to a few years ago, when Qi Jia and her friends were in high school. They were sitting in a circle, lighting up the night with colorful lights. They were close friends, laughing and chatting, holding hands, and running around in the campus.
The scene shifts to the evening, where Lin Shuer is dragging a reluctant Qi Jia to the park. Lin Shuer says: "Don't leave, don't you leave. Who the hell will pick up the soap for me if you go?"
The scene shifts to the street, where Qi Jia is wearing a wedding dress and holding a girl's hand, shouting: "I'm graduating!"
The scene shifts to the street, where Lin Shuer and Qi Jia are running together, laughing, and Qi Jia says: "Congratulations on finding your group, you crazy person."

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: Qi Jia said: "If we are about to die later on, can you get away from me? I don't want others to find us and say we died together due to a flood."
Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou in disbelief, then turned to look at the water outside the window, while Yuan Xiaoou also turned to look at the water.
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou, why do you want to die with me? Are you shy?"
Qi Jia, in a panic, pushed Yuan Xiaoou down and said, "Do you think I'm short of your breath? Open your mouth! Open it, Yuan Xiaoou!"
Qi Jia said, "You want to hold your breath, right? If you're going to hold your breath, I will hold mine with you."

Qi Jia, who was already immersed in the water, looked at Yuan Xiaoou in front of him, and Yuan Xiaoou also looked back at him. The two of them looked at each other for a long time, and then Yuan Xiaoou swam over to Qi Jia, cupped her face, and gently leaned on her.
Yuan Xiaoou said, "I really think it's good to die with you."
Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia in the car and asked, "Can I hug you?" Qi Jia nodded, and Yuan Xiaoou opened the car door and pulled Qi Jia into his arms.
The woman holding the umbrella said, "Where's my car?" "If I can't find it later," "I'll be in trouble."
Qi Jia held the phone in one hand, opened WeChat, and found a message from Yuan Xiaoou. Yuan Xiaoou said: "Hurry back and rescue us, the water has already seeped into the car. Hurry up!"

The car was submerged in water, and Yuan Xiaoou, who had escaped from the driver's seat, was also struggling in the water. The rescue team, wearing helmets and raincoats, worked together to reach the stranded people. Yuan Xiaoou was also rescued safely.

The rain had stopped, and the two walked down the stairs. Yuan Xiaoou, with arms crossed, walked ahead, and Qi Jia, limping, followed behind. They walked through a narrow alleyway, and as they passed a water storage tank, Yuan Xiaoou turned to look at it.
Yuan Xiaoou, who was originally walking ahead, suddenly stopped and called out to Qi Jia. Qi Jia turned around and looked at him. Yuan Xiaoou said, "Qi Jia."
Yuan Xiaoou, with arms crossed, asks: "Do you think I still need to go to Shanghai?"
Qi Jia, holding clothes, said to Yuan Xiaoou: "Go" "Isn't Shanghai quite good?"

Yuan Xiaoou, standing at the door, says: "I'm not going." Qi Jia, holding the drawing tools, glances at Yuan Xiaoou, then looks back at the wall, turns around, and heads inside. Yuan Xiaoou watches her back, then looks at the wall again.

Qi Jia, with hands on hips, looked at Yuan Xiaoou, then turned and walked away. Yuan Xiaoou, feeling dejected, watched Qi Jia leave, then turned back to glance at the house, took a deep breath, and followed.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4560_4740.text: The scene shifts to a small alley, where Yuan Xiaoou is pushing open a door and entering a house.

The next morning, Qi Jia woke up in the hospital. She sat up and looked around, finding herself in a completely unfamiliar environment. She saw a vase on the bedside table and a photo of Yuan Xiaoou on the cabinet across from her.
Qi Jia, wearing a pink shirt and a pair of shorts, stood on one foot and reached out to grab the envelope. After a few attempts, she finally managed to get it.
Qi Jia looked at the envelope, then opened it and took out the contents. There were two thick stacks of bills, and next to them was a business card with Yuan Xiaoou's name written on it.
The phone rings, and Qi Jia sees the caller ID, immediately hangs up, and then puts the phone back in its place.

Yuan Xiaoou: "Qi Jia, I don't like saying goodbye face to face. Let's say goodbye in this way. First and foremost, you must take your medicine on time, two bowls with half a pot of water, drink it after breakfast and dinner, the one at night doesn't need to be reheated, just warm it in hot water. Don't panic when you forget your keys, I've hidden a spare one in the electricity meter box at the door, you'll touch it as you reach out. You can't give up on exercise halfway, you must add ten sit-ups every week, and running must be an hour after dinner. When running, don't think about anything, just run."
Qi Jia walked into the kitchen, saw the knives on the table, and then opened the drawer, only to find that the knives were no longer there.

Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia, don't cry for the people who don't deserve it. Be the real you. You are kind, but good people should treat themselves better. When you're tired, sleep; when you wake up, smile. Simple life is the best. Thank you. Qi Jia, I'm leaving."
Yuan Xiaoou, holding a cactus, walked to the window, and just as he was about to throw away the pot, he saw Qi Jia passing by.

Qi Jia was startled by the cactus's reaction, and she slowly withdrew her hand. She watched the cactus for a long time, and the cactus also watched her, as if it was alive. Qi Jia's hand slowly moved towards the cactus, and the cactus slowly moved towards her hand. The red blood on her fingertip was like a drop of life, slowly flowing into the cactus.
Qi Jia, holding the cactus, looked at it with a smile, then turned and walked out the door.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4740_4920.text: Qi Jia walked out of the office building and encountered a delivery truck. The driver said, "Don't you value your life?!"
She looked around, and the van drove away. She turned to look at the billboard beside her, which had a tree and the words 'ecological park' on it.

The exhibition hall was buzzing with people. A tree painting was hung in the center, with a poem written underneath. The trunk of the tree was thick and sturdy, symbolizing the mother's steadfastness. The branches were lush, representing the wife's gentle and tender nature. The roots were deep and strong, symbolizing the family's stability and unity.
Qi Jia looked at the paintings in the gallery, her eyes full of expectation and emotion.

Qi Jia looked at the painting, then at the information about the painting, which read: In the spring of 1998, the tree that witnessed the two's love was still standing in the campus. The two of them were inseparable, and the scenes of their close friendship were vivid.
Qi Jia looked at the two people in the painting, kissing under the tree, and fell into memories.
Qi Jia looked at the paintings in the gallery, her eyes suddenly widened, as if she had discovered something.

The painting depicted a young couple passionately kissing. Qi Jia looked at the painting and thought of Yuan Xiaoou and herself. She never expected that the man who once made her feel special would now make her feel so betrayed.

Yuan Xiaoou said, 'Don't worry, as long as I'm here, I'll definitely protect both of you.' Yuan Xiaoou, who was being beaten, was rescued by his brothers. The waiter at the snack bar was so scared that he spilled the water on the table.

Yuan Xiaoou and Qi Jia started to tussle in the room. Yuan Xiaoou pushed Qi Jia against the wall and was about to take off his shirt. Qi Jia broke free and ran out of the room. Yuan Xiaoou chased after her and shouted, 'Don't worry, I'll definitely cure you.'

The scene shifts to the moment when Yuan Xiaoou and Qi Jia got married. The two of them were making their wedding vows in church. Yuan Xiaoou was wearing a dark suit, and Qi Jia was dressed in a white wedding gown. After the church ceremony, the two of them drove to the river. Yuan Xiaoou held Qi Jia in his arms, and they embraced each other.
Qi Jia walked out of the exhibition hall, and the scene gradually faded to black.
The scene shifts to Shanghai in 2014, tall buildings stretch towards the sky, and the city is bustling with people.

The scene shifts to the company, where a group of people are heading to the elevator. A male colleague says, 'See you,' as they part ways. The elevator doors slowly close, and the colleague, with a briefcase, heads to the company's reception.
Yuan Xiaoou, who was in a meeting, suddenly got up and walked out. He took off his glasses and threw them behind him, then walked straight towards Qi Jia.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: Yuan Xiaoou was at a social event, took out his phone to make a call, and said, 'Hey, rich lady, what made you think of calling me?'
Lin Shuer said, 'Yo, I was even worried that you were too busy with state affairs to take my call.'
Yuan Xiaoou said, "What am I busy with? It’s not that I don’t contact you all because I’m afraid you wouldn’t want to deal with me."

Yuan Xiaoou asked: "Why is she still in the hospital?"

The car slowly stops in front of the entrance, the door opens, and Yuan Xiaoou in a suit runs towards the building.

Yuan Xiaoou and Lin Shuer ran into the hospital lobby, looking around in a panic. Yuan Xiaoou spotted the registration desk and hurriedly approached, while Lin Shuer followed closely behind. They looked around the hospital, searching for the baby.
Yuan Xiaoou ran out of the elevator, looking around as he descended the stairs.
The scene shifts to a hospital, where Yuan Xiaoou and Lin Shuer are walking side by side. Lin Shuer suddenly calls out to Yuan Xiaoou, who stops and turns to look at her.
Yuan Xiaoou stood there, watching Lin Shuer's back as she left, then turned to look at the hospital entrance.
Yuan Xiaoou looked at Lin Shuer, then at the ring, and finally sat down on the bench, saying, "Lin Shuer"

movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.text: Yuan Xiaoou said: "Reject me," "If I don't leave, I can take care of you forever," "You wouldn't have ended up like this."

Qi Jia said: "Why should I find you""You are a promising young man, I am an old woman""So I have to see if you already have a harem". After saying that, Qi Jia shyly ran to Yuan Xiaoou and kissed him.

Yuan Xiaoou and Qi Jia kissed passionately, as if to make up for the years of separation. They embraced each other, their hearts finally at ease. Yuan Xiaoou, with eyes closed, savoring the kiss, felt a sudden unease. He pulled Qi Jia into his arms and kissed her again, but the unease remained. He opened his eyes and looked at Qi Jia, who was looking back at him with a smile, and then he laughed.

Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia". Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia with a bit of grievance, but Qi Jia just smiled. Yuan Xiaoou took off the ring from his left hand and put it on Qi Jia's hand. Qi Jia turned her head away, unwilling to look at him, but Yuan Xiaoou caught her hand and made her look at him.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I've been carrying it, and I always thought,""I will meet you someday". Yuan Xiaoou took out a ring from the box and handed it to Qi Jia, who was stunned by the ring.
"I shouldn't have let you go" Qi Jia said, then turned around and left, leaving Yuan Xiaoou alone, he knelt on the ground, holding the ring, looking at the departing figure of Qi Jia.
Yuan Xiaoou said, 'Can you give me a chance? I want to take care of you forever.'
Qi Jia turns around, looks at Yuan Xiaoou kneeling on one knee, and smiles. She slowly approaches Yuan Xiaoou, places her hand on his, and says, 'Okay.'
Yuan Xiaoou took the ring, holding Qi Jia's hand, and slowly put the ring on her ring finger.

Yuan Xiaoou held Qi Jia in his arms, and Qi Jia held him in return. They held each other with all their might, reluctant to let go. The joy of the moment overwhelmed them, and they couldn't help but embrace each other tightly. The world seemed to quiet down at that moment, with only the two of them in the world. The wedding invitation showed the names of the couple, Qi Jia and Liu Chong.
Qi Jia said: "I Qi Jia am willing to marry you Liu Chong. Whether in health or even better health, in my lifetime I will love you, be loyal to you, cherish you, until death do us part."
Liu Chong, hearing the noise, turned around and said, "I'm not ready yet." He then put his ears on his head, and Yuan Xiaoou and Qi Jia looked at each other.

Qi Jia said: 'Once I get my house back, I'll save the balcony for you.' 'Women are all the same.' 'Men are still better.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.text: The little girl said, 'Sit down.' Qi Jia looked at the little girl and smiled.

Qi Jia, holding her daughter, sat on the bus. The little girl looked at Qi Jia with her big eyes, while Qi Jia stared out the window, her eyes filled with worry and reluctance. The bus slowly started moving, and Qi Jia's expression grew heavier. She knew that the longer she delayed, the harder it would be for her daughter to accept.
Qi Jia sat in the car and looked out the window. The streets were filled with lush greenery, and the weather was clear. She felt as if she was in a beautiful dream, but her heart was still uneasy.

Qi Jia thought, 'Looking at this extremely familiar place, I realized that I have indeed entered menopause. Because it's in menopause that one loves to chew on the painful black memories of one's life.'
The scene shifts to the day of Lin Shuer's graduation. Lin Shuer, dressed in a white gown, ran joyfully on the road, with a group of classmates behind her, clapping and cheering.

Principal: "Students," "Next, please representative of the graduates," "Classmate Liu Chong," "onto the stage for a speech."

Qi Jia, dressed in a white gown, ran towards Liu Chong with a beaming smile. Liu Chong, wearing a black graduation gown and a red stole, turned to look at Qi Jia. The crowd below applauded as they approached the stage, and Principal, standing on the stage, smiled and shook hands with Liu Chong.

Lin Shuer, who had just changed into a new outfit, came out and asked, "Yuan Xiaoou, how did you bring him here?"

Lin Shuer asked, 'What, are you scared?'
Yuan Xiaoou said, "Just kidding, don't worry, I will protect both of you in the future. Ah, I even have some chest muscles."
Lin Shuer said, "From now on, you block the knives and take the punches."
"Got it," Yuan Xiaoou said, nodding at Lin Shuer, then Lin Shuer turned and left.

Lin Shuer: "Don't get used to living here, you should find a room as soon as possible." Yuan Xiaoou nodded, then turned and left. After closing the door, he couldn't help but laugh. The scene flashed back to the day he first saw Qi Jia.
Qi Jia drove the car to the side of the road, suddenly, a hand grabbed Qi Jia's hair. Qi Jia: "Qi Jia, get up."

Yuan Xiaoou returned home, changed out of his uniform, and sat by the bed. He picked up the clothes he had washed earlier and gently placed them on Qi Jia's hand. Qi Jia was already asleep, and Yuan Xiaoou sat quietly by the bed, looking at the sleeping Qi Jia.

There's pressure to have a place to live, to eat, to use water and electricity, all kinds of pressure. Everything else is going up in price. Can I not raise it? Am I not embarrassed if I don't raise it?"
Wang Xiaobing says, "No, no, no, I'm sorry."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: Zhao Bing, with her hands on her knees, gasping for breath, suddenly lifted her head and saw the old lady's wrinkled face in the mirror. She immediately straightened up and tidied her hair.

Zhao Bing said: "I gave you the opportunity to leave." "It's your own failure to take it." "It's fate." "If you were me," "would you let me go?"

If you really had no ulterior motives, you would not have copied that USB flash drive and taken it away; you would have destroyed it right then and there."
Xu Decai's eyes were filled with disappointment and regret. He looked at Zhao Bing and said, "I've finally seen you for what you truly are, Zhao Bing. You are a villain."
Zhao Bing, with tears in her eyes, said: "Are you judging me? What right do you have to judge me? What kind of person are you? Don't you know yourself?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.text: Xu Decai, with a frown, said: "Stop talking, I understand everything."

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: Yang Shan smiled and handed the wine to Xu Decai, while Driver looked away, not wanting to drink.
Yang Shan raised a glass and said, "Little Soldier, I owe you a lot over the years. Take care of your wife and kids, and look after me, too. This cup is to honor you."
Yang Shan picked up the wine glass and said: "This is the rose wine I brewed myself. It's non-alcoholic and doesn't contain any alcohol."

Yang Shan smiled and said: "Come on, the apprentice of Little Soldier."

Yang Shan said, 'Little Soldier, how have you become so harsh? The young brother has been here for a while and hasn't spoken; is the food not to your liking? Come on, don't just sit there.'
Driver said: "He doesn't speak, he just eats, already finishing half a bowl of rice."
Yang Shan looked at Driver and said: "Little Soldier, we won't be moving too far away from here."

Yang Shan smiled and said: "That's good." Yang Shan looked at Xu Decai, then turned to look at Driver.
Driver said: "You know, Yang Shan, I think you should have left this place a long time ago. I know in your heart you can't let go of that bastard, and you don't want to see him. Why bother?"

Driver looked at Xu Decai, who was lost in thought, and said: "Ah, right, when moving, remember to take my dancing shoes. They were a gift from Xu Decai."
Xu Decai looked at the photo of Yang Shan on the desk, then at the ballet shoes in his hand, and couldn't help but shed tears. He closed his eyes and wiped the tears from his cheeks.
