Dazaang, after pondering for a moment, said: "I just feel it's very sudden." "Why would you ask such a question?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: Woman said, "So, is it or is it not?"
Da Zang looked at Woman and said, 'If I didn't like you, I wouldn't be around you all the time.'
Woman asked, "Do you like me before I lost my memory, or after I lost my memory?"
Da Zang said: "I like both"
The scene shifts to the beach, where Ben Yue is holding a piece of fish and offering it to Fang Baoyu, saying, "You take it, we are already full"
Fang Baoyu looked at the girl in front of him, his eyes were a bit red, and he said, "I thought that you would never talk to me again."
Ben Yue said, "Fang Baoyu, I know, you were forced to go to Zhu'er's room in Baiyun Temple."

Ben Yue said: "Wang Dian's plan was seen through by the Holy Mother" "so that night" "when you were practicing" "the Holy Mother hid in the shadows" "used her skills to confuse your mind" "she meant to send you to my room" "but ended up sending you to Zhu'er's room"
Fang Baoyu said, "How do you know all this?"
Ben Yue said, 'The Holy Mother and I are very close, to ensure my survival, she told me everything.'

The scene shifts to a small courtyard, where a family of four is sitting around a table. Fang Baoyu and his wife look at the two guests in front of them, then the wife speaks: "It's too hot, let's go inside and rest."
Waiter said: "Oh, my guests, please come in, hey, sit here." The innkeeper lady led the way, bringing the young master to a table. Waiter brought over a kettle and poured tea for them.
Waiter asked: "What would you like to order, my guest?"
Fang Baoyu said: "Anything will do"
Waiter said: "Ah, just a moment"
Duchess Tuo Chen walked to the window, and Ben Yue followed. Fang Baoyu stopped her and said, "Wait, don't drink yet"
Ben Yue asked: "What's wrong?"
Fang Baoyu said: "Look at his boots" "they obviously belong to an imperial official" "We can't stay here for long, let's leave quickly" "You go to Fengbo Pavilion ahead" "I'll follow shortly"
Ben Yue said: "Okay, be careful."
The scene shifts to the dining room, where the guests are seated at the table. A waitress brings the dishes to the table, and the guests start to eat. Waiter says: "My guest, your bun is here"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.text: Fang Baoyu, who had just picked up a knife, was instantly knocked to the ground by a kick from the soldier. The other soldiers rushed up, and Fang Baoyu quickly got up to block them.
Fang Baoyu leaped up, delivering a flying kick that knocked the leader to the ground. The other bandits rushed forward, but Fang Baoyu swiftly dealt with them.

The man in red clothes was the first to attack Fang Baoyu, but he was driven back by a counterattack. Another person rushed up, and Fang Baoyu dodged his attack and immediately knocked him down with a counterstrike. The remaining people in the room were not as skilled as the first two. Fang Baoyu quickly dealt with them, leaving only one person who was as fast as the wind and moon, but he was knocked down by Fang Baoyu with a single palm strike.
The scene shifts to the flashback, where Mulang Shenjun, with a cold expression, looks at Fang Baoyu and says, "Even if you kill them all, you still won't stand a chance."

The soldiers of the Feather Clan, armed with long spears, charged into the courtyard. Mulang Shenjun, with a stern face, looked at the spear in Fang Baoyu's hand and said, "You should recognize these weapons, shouldn't you?"

Mulang Shenjun said: "Drop the knife." Mulang Shenjun's eyes were sharp, and his gaze was like a sharp sword, making people shiver. Fang Baoyu was not one to back down either, and he stared back at Mulang Shenjun with fierce eyes.
The camera switches to the interior of the house, where Mulang Shenjun holds a long knife in his hand, with his index finger resting on the hilt.
The three people who had been fighting outside came to the entrance of the house, panting heavily, and said, "Go, go, hurry up, move faster, get inside."
Duchess Tuo Chen said: "Let go!"
The soldier said: "Supervisor, the person has been brought here."
Mulang Shenjun said: "You may leave now."
The subordinate replied, 'Yes.'
Duchess Tuo Chen, who had been running, stopped and stood in front of Mulang Shenjun, looking at him with a face full of anger.
Duchess Tuo Chen was stunned, and Mulang Shenjun turned to leave.
Duchess Tuo Chen looked at Mulang Shenjun, and Mulang Shenjun gently pushed her back.
Duchess Tuo Chen's eyes widened in shock as she stared at Mulang Shenjun. Mulang Shenjun's face turned cold, and he stared back at her without blinking.
Duchess Tuo Chen, with tears in her eyes, looked at Mulang Shenjun and said, "Tuocheng, I never imagined I would meet you here."

Duchess Tuo Chen, with tears in her eyes, looked at Mulang Shenjun, but her hand kept shaking. She pushed Mulang Shenjun away and said, "Don't touch me." She then glared at Mulang Shenjun and asked, "Who are you?"

Duchess Tuo Chen was stunned, her eyes filled with disbelief. She stared at Mulang Shenjun without blinking, her pupils trembling slightly. Mulang Shenjun, on the other hand, was also deeply shocked. He stared at the pebble under his foot, his eyes filled with confusion.

Ben Yue, with a flicker of her eyes, looked at the man in front of her, then bent down to pick up the box from the ground. She stood up and walked towards the door, with the man following her closely.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: Fang Baoyu said, "At dawn, they will kill us"
Ben Yue asked, 'Fang Baoyu, are you afraid?'
Fang Baoyu said, "Facing death, who isn't afraid?" "However, what I feel more is unwillingness" "I feel I've let many people down" "First of all, I failed my grandfather since I couldn't avenge him."
Fang Baoyu said: "And I also failed the Purple-Robed Marquis" "betrayed his expectations of me" "the person I wronged the most is you" "I promised them" "I promised them everything"
Ben Yue said: "No, I can't let you do something foolish, you can't become a lackey of the court, you can't work for the Wood Wolf God."
Fang Baoyu turned around and saw Ben Yue's father standing at the door. Ben Yue's father said, "I am your grandfather."
The three of them walked side by side under the shade of the trees, with Huyan Dazang carrying a long sword behind him.
Shitai said, "Alright, this is where we part ways, I wish you both much fortune and long life." Shitai said this and then turned to leave.
Zhu Er said: "Shitai." Shitai felt a bit embarrassed, and Zhu Er gave her a reassuring smile.
Huyan Dazang and Zhu Er were about to leave, but Bai Sankong stopped them. Zhu Er was very angry and drew his sword at Bai Sankong. Huyan Dazang quickly stepped in to stop him.
Zhu Er shouted: "Shitai"

Huyan Dazang, with a flash of his sword, quickly dealt with the obstructing enemies. He then held his sword in front of Zhu Er and said, "Stop, take one more step and I'll kill her in front of you all."
Zhu Er asked, "Shitai, are you alright?"
Shitai said, "No, no."
Huyan Dazang said: "Wang Dian, what do you want?"
Wang Dian, with a knife at Shitai's neck, said, '"Kill him and I'll release this old nun.'"
Huyan Dazang said: "Zhu Er has lost her memory" "The poison has been neutralized" "She won't listen to you anymore"
Huyan Dazang said: "Zhu Er, have you really lost your memory? You don't remember me?"
Wang Dian laughed and said, "You can't fool me." "Quick, kill that Huyan Dazang now."
Shitai said, "Come here, remember my last words."

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: Shitai said: "Remember what I just said."
Zhu Er said: "Don't do it Shitai", Zhu Er saw that Shitai was about to stab Dazaang, and quickly stopped him.

Dazaang, with a single slash, killed the obstructing enemies. In an instant, the enemies around him fell like cut grass. Dazaang leaped into the air, kicking down several more enemies. His swordplay was so swift that it was like a whirling wind, and his movements so light and effortless that they seemed like dancing. His blade was like a rainbow, pointing directly at Wang Dian.
Wang Dian was furious and wanted to kill Dazaang, but Dazaang dodged Wang Dian's attack and then kicked him in the chest. Dazaang said: "Do you know you have killed a kind monk?"
Dazaang, with a fierce look, charged at Wang Dian. The two engaged in a fierce battle, with Dazaang pressing step by step. He shouted, "Wang Dian, you are going to die."

Wang Dian said: "Not so easy", Wang Dian was still not giving up, and Dazaang was also not willing to admit defeat. The two were evenly matched in their struggle, with punches and kicks landing wildly. Dazaang was caught off guard and received a heavy blow to the head, but he quickly got up and continued the fight.

Dazaang, with a fierce look, charged at Wang Dian with his sword. Wang Dian, with a calm face, blocked Dazaang's sword with his own. Dazaang's sword was knocked flying, and he was knocked to the ground.
Dazaang swung his sword left and right, pressing step by step. Wang Dian was caught off guard and his sword was cut in half. Dazaang said: "If the heaven doesn’t take you, I will!"
Zhu Er said: "Wait". Zhu Er stood up and looked at Wang Dian.
Shitai shouted: "Zhu Er" "Zhu Er" "Please beg him to save dad please" "Please beg him" "Zhu Er"

Zhu Er said: "I remember you are my dad, I also remember how you killed grandma with a sword. Now you don't even spare Shitai, you are not human at all, you do not deserve to live. Your life, your life, will only bring more harm to others."
Wang Dian said: "Zhu Er, please beg him for mercy for the sake of our father-daughter relationship."
Zhu Er said: "You killed grandma with your own hands, what family are you talking about?"
The scene shifts to the study, where Bai Sankong pours a bowl of tea for Wang Dian.
Bai Sankong said: "I told you, if anything happens to Baoyu, I won't let you go. Your men are all mediocrity. It would be easy for me to kill you."
Mulang Shenjun said: "Bai Sankong, you've always been dedicated in your work for the court. Is it worth it to ruin your future for a mere Fang Baoyu?"
Bai Sankong said: "Baoyu is my only family, even though I have wealth and influence, and hold a high official position."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: Bai Sankong said, "Even if I have wealth and power, what use is it without him? If you don't agree with me, we can part ways, and you'll be the one to regret it."

The guard reported: "Report, sir, Fang Baoyu, he says he wants to see you." Bai Sankong looked at the three people in the hall, then turned to look at the plaque in front of him. The three people in the hall stood in a triangle formation, with Zhu Er sitting on the left side of the hall, fiddling with the incense in front of him.

Zhu Er, who had been busy tidying up the house, heard Huyan Dazang's words, put down the clothes in hand, and walked towards him. She sat opposite Huyan Dazang and said: "Do you blame me for regaining my memory long ago but never telling you?"
Huyan Dazang said: "I knew it a long time ago; I just didn't say it."
Zhu Er said: "You knew?"
Huyan Dazang said: "That night in the grass hut, your words and actions already gave it away."
Zhu Er asked: "Then why didn't you expose me?"

Huyan Dazang said: "Because during this period, these have been the happiest days since we fell in love. I stayed away from the tumultuous life of the martial world and led a carefree life of planting and tending crops. I didn't want to ruin this harmony."
Zhu Er said: "I also cherish everything here." "But it's all over now."
Huyan Dazang said: "I've made up my mind." "I want to find the Nine Treasured Swords as soon as possible to fulfill my master's wish and leave the martial world."
Zhu Er said: "But finding all nine treasured swords is bound to be extremely difficult."
Huyan Dazang said: "I know." "Recently, I've heard of a place in southern Sichuan called Jiange that has the remaining six swords." "I wonder if you would come with me."
Zhu Er said: "From now on, no matter where you go, I will never leave you. Even if it's a dragon's den or a tiger's lair, I will accompany you through it."
Huyan Dazang, with a smile, looked at Mulang Shenjun, while Fang Baoyu, standing by, was very puzzled. He walked up to Mulang Shenjun and said, "I came to see you to ask you to release Ben Yue."
Mulang Shenjun said: "Alright, I assume your grandfather already told you that if you want to see Ben Yue, you must bring the heads of Ziyi Hou and Baishui Shengmu in exchange."
Fang Baoyu said: "Don't even think about it."
Mulang Shenjun said: "Do you have any other choice?" Fang Baoyu looked at Mulang Shenjun, then turned to look at Zhu Er.
Zhu Er, who was hiding in the bushes, was shocked by the scene. She saw a man with eight arms fighting for the group, and Zhu Er said: "Isn't that Eight-Armed Divine Ape Li Ziyuan?" "Why is he here?"

Huyan Dazang said: "I'll take advantage of the chaos to capture him and ask." Huyan Dazang had just finished speaking when he saw a figure with a masked face, wielding a short sword, rushing towards the bandits. The leader, Ba Bi Shen Yuan Li Ziyuan, was not one to back down either. He grabbed a long sword and charged towards the masked man.
Fang Baoyu drew his sword and said: "Tell me, where is Wang Dian? Don't try any tricks."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.text: Man said: "I really don't know. I was ordered to wait for him in South Chuan for a month, but he never showed up."
Fang Baoyu asked: "Whose orders?"
Man said: "Of course, it was the order of the chief."
Fang Baoyu asked: "What is the relationship between Wang Dian and the Forbidden Guards?"
Man said: "I really don't know that."
The woman said: "Fang Baoyu"
Fang Baoyu turned around and said: "Zhu Er"
Huyan Dazang poured the wine and handed the cup to Zhu Er, Zhu Er asked: "Why did you bring wine?"

Huyan Dazang said: "Since I came to the Central Plains, I have been solely focused on seeking the sword, and often thought we would have a fight. I didn't expect to be fighting alongside you today, it’s delightful. Cheers."

At this moment, a commotion was heard from the main hall. Fang Baoyu immediately stood up and ran out, with the others following. He reached the entrance and found that the ground was littered with broken tiles. He picked up a tile and examined it closely.
Fang Baoyu: "At dawn tomorrow, at the fortress gate, Ben Yue's blood will be spilled on the yellow sand, Mulang Deity."

The scene shifts to the military camp, where a large number of soldiers are standing in formation. In the center, there is a woman hanging from a tree, with a large knife stuck in the ground in front of her. At the foot of the tree, there is a table set for a meal, with four people sitting at it.
The scene shifts to the execution ground, where Ben Yue is tied to a cross with ropes, her hands bound above her head, and her feet resting on the ground.
Ben Yue said: "Fang Baoyu, don't come over!" "Don't come over, Baoyu!"
Mulang Shenjun looked at the two of them and said: "You are really loyal, coming here together to die."
Fang Baoyu said: "I’m asking you one last time, will you release the person or not?"

Mulang Shenjun looked at the man in front of him and asked, "What do you think?" The man looked at the woman beside him, then turned to look at Mulang Shenjun. The woman beside him was staring at him, waiting for his answer.
Fang Baoyu, who had been hiding in the carriage, jumped out and fought with Zhu Er. The two were evenly matched, and Zhu Er was unable to defeat Fang Baoyu.
Fang Baoyu, who had been knocked to the ground, was still not giving up. He got up and continued to fight with the people around him.
The two engaged in close combat, Mulang Shenjun's martial arts skills were not bad, but they were no match for Bai Sankong's.

Huyan Dazang, with a fierce look, charged at Bai Sankong with the long sword. Bai Sankong, with a flip, landed on the ground, dodged the long sword, and then stood firm, ready to fight with Huyan Dazang.
The two engaged in close combat, with the sound of swords and blades ringing. Bai Sankong pressed step by step, forcing Huyan Dazang to retreat repeatedly.
The two were quickly defeated by the encircling soldiers, collapsing in the middle of the formation. The old man and the three women watched with concern, not knowing who would win.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: Li Xiaoran said: "It's not a duel, it's a beating."
The two people inside the door were no match for the three outside, and they fell to the ground. The three people outside dragged the two inside and said, "Let's go, let's go."
Zhu Er asked: "Why did you kill him?"
Huyan Dacang said, "Didn't you want to kill him just now?"
Zhu Er said, "I didn't mean for you to kill him! That's not what I meant! How am I supposed to explain this to others?" Zhu Er tried to stop him, but Huyan Dacang brushed her off and walked away.
Huyan Dacang said, "I have other things to do." "I helped you kill him." "You helped bandage my wound." "We owe each other nothing."
Zhu Er said, "What do you mean, owe each other nothing?" "Everyone saw you kill him for me." "What am I supposed to do? What should I do?"
Huyan Dacang said, "He deserved to die."

Zhu Er said, 'Hey, I'm going to follow you. You have to help me explain. You killed the person. It has nothing to do with me. Otherwise, people will think I'm your accomplice. I couldn't clear my name even if I jumped into the Yellow River.'

The letter read: "My Lord, upon reading this letter, I fear my days are numbered. I have no other attachments in this life. I only leave my daughter Bai Yanzhu's son. I earnestly request that the Lord take him in and pass on martial arts to him."
Servant clasped his hands together and said: "I hope the Lord will grant this wish."
Purple Marquis said: "Your grandfather wants me to take you as a disciple."
Servant said, '"Hurry and bow to your master.'" The two hurriedly bowed, and the scene shifted to the forest, where Zhu Er was fanning Huyan Dacang.
Zhu Er looked around and said, "The sea breeze is strong here, we must be near the sea."
Zhu Er asked, "What are you planning to do?"
Huyan Dacang looked at the bamboo slips in his hand, then at Zhu Er, and said: "You should leave."
Zhu Er said: "How many times do I have to tell you" "You killed Li Xiaoran" "I have no way to survive if I go back"
Huyan Dacang said: "I'm going to a duel this time. My life is uncertain. Thank you for taking care of me these past few days. Please, go back."
Zhu Er said: "If you keep fighting like this, one day you'll die."
Huyan Dacang said: "To die for the way of the sword, I have no regrets."
Zhu Er asked: "What about your family?"
Huyan Dacang said: "I have no family."
Zhu Er said: "Surely you have friends who are worried about you."
Huyan Dacang said: "Friend?" "Speaking of friends, you're the only one."
Zhu Er stood up and said, "I won't let you leave."
Huyan Dacang said: "If you keep talking, I will kill you too."
Zhu Er said, "You would even kill friends."
The scene shifts to the bedroom, where Brother Wang says, 'My Lord, I presume you are already aware of my request.'
Purple Marquis said: "I'm sorry, Brother Wang, I no longer concern myself with the matters of the martial world."

Brother Wang said: "But this concerns the honor and disgrace of the martial arts world in the Central Plains." "The one renowned as the best swordfighter, Purple Marquis," "isn't willing to fight for the justice of the martial world?"
Purple Marquis said: "Brother Wang, to be honest, I really don't enjoy the days filled with fighting and killing, moreover, what if I were the best in the world at martial arts."
Brother Wang said: "I would like to show the Marquis something, please."
Servant said: "Please, Marquis, come out of retirement."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4380_4560.text: Fang Baoyu leaped into the air, delivering a flying kick that knocked the soldier to the ground. He then landed and executed a spinning kick, knocking another soldier into the air before crashing down heavily.

The two engaged in a fierce battle, with the guards' weapons being no match for Mu Lang's. In moments, he had dealt with the encircling guards, leaving only Ben Yue and Fang Baoyu. Mu Lang leaped into the air, aiming to strike Fang Baoyu with both blades, but Fang Baoyu dodged with a back step and then leaped into the air, kicking Mu Lang's chest.
Fang Baoyu and Mu Lang fought evenly for a while, but Fang Baoyu gradually got the upper hand, forcing Mu Lang to retreat repeatedly.
Fang Baoyu and Mu Lang looked at each other, their eyes filled with determination. Ben Yue, who was sitting on the side, frowned and looked worriedly at Mu Lang.
Mu Lang looked at the girl on the cross, then drew his sword and pointed it at Fang Baoyu. Fang Baoyu widened his eyes in shock, and Ben Yue spat out a mouthful of blood.

The two entangled in battle, with the sound of clashing swords and blades, and the shouts of exertion from fists and feet, were like a tidal wave, sweeping through the entire city of Tiandu. The battle of wits between the two was not as intense as the previous fight, but rather a display of overwhelming strength.
Seeing this, the two leaped into the air, kicking down the soldiers who were about to seize the dragon mace. The soldiers were knocked to the ground, and the two landed and continued to fight.
The guards, who were originally in a state of panic, were now brimming with fighting spirit, rushing towards the direction of the two.

Yan Zhu's martial arts skills were solid, and her moves were powerful and swift. In a short while, she felled many soldiers. Seeing this, the Imperial Guards became anxious and started to attack her. Ben Yue was worried, but there was nothing she could do.
Bai Sankong, with a wave of his sleeve, repels the soldiers with his divine powers.
Yan Zhu, seeing the situation was dire, leaped into the air, delivering a flying kick that knocked the two fighters to the ground.
Purple Marquis rushed over and said, "Yan Zhu, Yan Zhu, are you alright?"

Seeing the situation was dire, Mu Lang leaped up, knocking the two soldiers into the air. He then used his internal force to knock them down. The soldiers were no match for Mu Lang and were quickly defeated.
The flower girl, holding the child, was knocked down by a guard. Seeing this, Ben Yue and Mu Lang hurriedly ran over. The guard, upon seeing this, shouted, "Kill them quickly."
The children were fleeing in all directions, and the soldiers were chasing them. Yan Zhu shouted, "Stop!"

Yan Zhu, who had been waiting in the courtyard for a long time, saw the approaching Mu Lang and stopped in her tracks. She looked at Mu Lang with a face full of disbelief, while Mu Lang smiled and walked straight past Yan Zhu.
The two rushed to the stable, only to find Yan Zhu injured and lying on the ground. Seeing this, Purple Marquis quickly went to check on her, saying, "Yan Zhu!"

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Yan Zhu, who had fainted, was in a bad state. She suddenly let out a sigh, and her chest heaved rapidly.
Yan Zhu said: "Purple Marquis, am I about to die? I really didn't expect my father to still be alive."
Purple Marquis said, "You will be fine, trust me, you will be fine."
Yan Zhu, who had been awakened by the noise, was still in a daze. Bai Sankong, who had arrived, called out, "Yan Zhu, is it really you?"
Purple Marquis said: "Do not come any closer."
Purple Marquis said, "She is really my daughter."
The swordsman said: "What are you doing here? So the Swordsman of Qingping is indeed not dead. What do you want?"
Bai Sankong said, "I am here to find my daughter." "I want to talk to her alone."
Yan Zhu said: "Purple Marquis, please step out for a moment." Bai Sankong looked at the two people in front of him, then turned and walked to the other side of the hall.

Bai Sankong said: "Yan Zhu, why? Why would you rather hide your identity and live as the Great Demon Whitewater Saintess of the martial world, than reunite with your family? Than acknowledge me? Does it mean you can even abandon your son? Why is that?"

Yan Zhu said, "Why?" "Don't you know why?" "When I was at my wit's end, Whitewater Saintess saved me." "I know she is denounced by everyone as a demoness." "But she treated me as her own child. And you?" "You used despicable means" "to separate me from Huo Feiteng, the love of my life, and let him die tragically outside the pass." "Was what you did meaningful? Was it meaningful?"
Bai Sankong said: "If you still recognize me as your father, then you should recognize Fang Baoyu too."
Yan Zhu, with tears in her eyes, looked at Bai Sankong. Bai Sankong, with a trembling voice, said, "What did you say?" "You are my mother?"
Yan Zhu said: "I am Fang Baoyu."
Fang Baoyu asked in shock, "Purple Marquis, is this true?"

Purple Marquis said: "Yes, she is your mother. I wanted to tell you earlier, but there was never a good opportunity. Now that the enemies are at the gates, if I don't tell you now, there may never be another chance. This is also your grandfather's wish."
Fang Baoyu said: "No, it can't be. It absolutely can't be."
Yan Zhu said: "Fang Baoyu, no, Fang Baoyu."
Purple Marquis said: "Calm down."
Da Zang said: "Now that your family is reunited, I congratulate you all."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: Purple Marquis stopped Da Zang, saying: "Da Zang, this matter also concerns you. Please don't leave yet."
Da Zang said: "I am from Penglai, this family matter has nothing to do with me."
Yan Zhu said: "That swordsman Huo Feiteng died under your master's sword."
Da Zang asked: "What evidence do you have?"

Yan Zhu said: "Have you forgotten I once inquired about your background? You even told me. You said your master is Gongsun Liang of the Northern Penglai Celestial Sect. Your father and your master both prized their swords. Your father entrusted you to your master on his deathbed, correct?"
Da Zang said: "Yes, my master told me everything. He said he met my father in the Central Plains."
Yan Zhu asked: "You said the jade pendant you carry is the only thing your father left you, right?"

Yan Zhu said: "The jade pendant is Huo Feiteng's family heirloom. You've always treated it as a talisman. Back in the day, he gave it to me as a token of affection, and I gave it to you on the day you turned one month old. The eagle tattoo on your back is exactly the same as Feiteng’s. I don't know how your master took you to Penglai, but I know you are the child of Feiteng and me. You are my child."
Da Zang said: "So according to you, my master is my father's killer, Baoyu is my brother, and you are my mother. Impossible, I won't believe it."
Yan Zhu, with tears in her eyes, walked up to her husband and said: "I know you love me."
Yan Zhu, with tears in her eyes, looked at the zither, then at Bai Sankong.
Bai Sankong looked at the two people in front of him, his eyes filled with a sense of helplessness and reluctance. He then plucked the strings of the zither.
Mulang Shenjun said: "Bai Sankong, you're in quite high spirits today."
Bai Sankong, sitting in the pavilion, looked at the lute in Yan Zhu's hands and said: 'May I have the honor of hearing you play a piece today?'
Bai Sankong said: "The ancients played the zither for their own amusement, not for others. I’m just playing by myself today. However, I know you appreciate good music, sir."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: Supervisor said: "I'm just here for the fun."
Bai Sankong:"However, since the Supervisor has said so, if I don't give face, it would be too disrespectful."
The scene shifts to the interior of the boat, where Bai Sankong is plucking the strings of the zither.
Supervisor, with a look of admiration, watches Bai Sankong. Bai Sankong, with a smile, continues to play the zither.

Supervisor, with a smile, looked at Bai Sankong, who was staring back with unwavering eyes. Bai Sankong's fingers moved with lightning speed over the strings and frets, playing a piece of music. The sound of the zither echoed through the valley.
Supervisor said: "Bai Sankong, using this much force, aren't you afraid of destroying this ancient Song Dynasty zither?"
Bai Sankong: "Unexpectedly, it seems even you, esteemed sir, understand zithers."

Supervisor said, 'The satin patterns on the zither face must be snake belly stripes, right? It should be from the Tang or Song Dynasty. Bai Sankong, using such a precious zither, must have a high level of mastery.'
Bai Sankong:"Supervisor, you truly are an expert. Come, come, let me play a tune."
Supervisor said: "Bai Sankong, be careful, if you destroy this zither, it would be a great pity."
Bai Sankong says, 'It won't come to that.' Bai Sankong suddenly grabs Supervisor's hand and forcefully pulls it down, causing the lute to fall to the ground.

The guerrilla fighters were not outdone, and the battle became even more intense. The Nationalist soldiers were caught off guard by the guerrilla fighters' sudden ambush.

The guerrilla fighters quickly retreated, leaving the battlefield. The Japanese soldiers were still not giving up, and continued to chase after the fleeing fighters. The two planes of the Japanese army dropped bombs, and the battlefield was shrouded in smoke.
The scene shifts to a hospital room, where Mo Han is lying on the bed, his eyes open, staring at the ceiling.
Lin Lin said: "You're awake?"
Mo Han asked: "Where am I?"
Lin Lin said: "In the medical room."
Mo Han said: "I'm still alive."
Lin Lin said: "The doctor said the bullet almost hit your heart. For me, Mo Han, I had misjudged you before."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Lin Lin said: "It's up to you, I'm sorry."
Mo Han said: "The one who should be sorry is me." "I didn't know your mother." "And your boyfriend were all... by the Japanese." "I'm sorry."
Lin Lin looked at Mo Han on the bed, and suddenly Mo Han let out a sigh, Lin Lin called out: "Mo Han, Mo Han, Doctor, Doctor"
Che Zhen Shan angrily said: "If something happens to Secretary Yang, I'll have your life."
Lu Xiao said:"Yes, my life was the one group leader saved, from a pile of dead bodies. The group leader can take it without a word, just for this one, an unclaimed, useless secretary."
Che Zhen Shan shouted, "Impertinence! Get out of here."
Lu Xiao said, "Group leader."
Lu Xiao said, "Get out." Lu Xiao kicked Che Zhen Shan out of the room, and Che Zhen Shan left with a frown, sitting down with a thud.
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Come back. Lu Xiao should think longer before acting. You've followed me for so many years. Ah, how can you still act so recklessly, like a headless fly.'
Lu Xiao stood up, his face full of worry, and said: "There's something I can't figure out." "Tell me who dares to cross me, Che Zhen Shan, on this turf of Liu City?"
Lu Xiao said, "You suspect the identity of the kidnappers."
Che Zhen Shan sat down and said: "Although I haven't met all the local bandit leaders, I've heard of them. But the way this group acted today was strange."
Che Zhen Shan asked: "Where do you think they came from?"
Lu Xiao said, 'The bandits in the Northeast are causing trouble. Could they come from there.'
Che Zhen Shan stood up and said: 'Immediately seal the city and inspect it thoroughly.'
Lu Xiao said: "Yes, I'll go right away."
Che Zhen Shan said: 'Wait, you accompany me to visit Secretary Yang first.'
The military officer said, "Look at him"
Che Zhen Shan said: 'You're still my deputy.' Che Zhen Shan put on his military cap and left.
Lin Lin held the bowl in one hand and the spoon in the other, slowly bringing the soup to Mo Han's lips.
Mo Han said, "Yu Xuan, I'm leaving. Can you let me kiss you once? Just once."
Yu Xuan laughed and said: "Wait until after the revolution is victorious."
Mo Han looked at Yu Xuan, then turned and walked to the door, saying: "Then I'm leaving. Take care."
Yu Xuan, who was about to step forward to stop him, was called by his own nickname, Yu Xuan. Yu Xuan ran to the window and saw Mo Han walking away with a suitcase.
Mo Han's expression was very serious, and Lin Lin was also worried. She had never thought that the boy who was lively and energetic just a year ago had now become so serious and worried.
Lin Lin asked: "Does it hurt?"
Lin Lin wiped Mo Han's forehead with a towel, and Mo Han closed his eyes in pain. Lin Lin said: "Mo Han, for me, you almost lost your life."
Mo Han said: "This is not..."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Mo Han said: 'I'm not dead yet, don't be sad. Even if I die, it's deserved.'
Lin Lin cried and said, 'I can never repay you for your kindness in this lifetime.'
Mo Han said, "Don't mention that. Do you remember 'The Peony Pavilion'? The living can die, the dead can live. Maybe everything is destined."
Lin Lin, with tears in her eyes, looked at Mo Han, wiped her tears, and was about to get up to leave. At this moment, Lu Xiao walked in and said, 'Lin Lin, let me do it.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Lin Lin, the commander-in-chief is here to see you.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Lin Lin, let me do it. Look how tired you've become these past few days.'
Lin Lin said, 'I want to give everything to the person who has given their life for me.'
Lu Xiao said, "That's too complicated for me to understand. All I know is, as a man, I can't always let a girl accompany me.""Isn't that right, Secretary Yang?"
Lin Lin said, 'What nonsense are you talking about? Who let you in?'
Lin Lin said, 'I will move him to my room tomorrow and accompany him every day.'
Lu Xiao said: 'Lin Lin, don't joke around.'
Lin Lin said: 'I mean what I say.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Lu Xiao, you should go and take care of that matter. Hurry up.'
Che Zhen Shan, with a face full of sympathy for Lin Lin, walked to her side and said, 'Lin Lin, that's just the way Lu Xiao is. Don't take it to heart.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Lin Lin, let me do it.'
Lin Lin, while eating, said, 'No need.'
Che Zhen Shan asked, 'Lin Lin, are you feeling better?'
Mo Han said, 'Commander, I'm sorry for causing you trouble.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Don't think too much, just focus on healing.'
Lu Xiao, who was about to leave, was startled by the sudden commotion. Che Zhen Shan asked, 'What? The bandit escaped?'
Lu Xiao said, "The checkpoint at Dongda bridge says,""They escaped by boat last night.""They even kidnapped a hostage as a cover."
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Such elusive behavior, it's not a common bandit. Could it be the Communist Party?'

Che Zhen Shan, puzzled, says, '"But why would the Communist Party kidnap my daughter?"Not killing her or doing anything cruel and unusual,""just for a hundred taels of gold? Is that possible?""If they're not after gold, then what are they after?"
Lu Xiao added, 'They also kidnapped a businessman's daughter not too long ago.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Oh, it seems like they are really bandits after all.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Lin Lin walked to the table, put the folder on the table, and then took out a small notebook from the pocket on her skirt.
Mo Han said: "This music is so nice." "Lin Lin, I think I should go back." "Living here is not very convenient." "You need to work and take care of me."

Lin Lin said: 'Don't get your wires crossed. I'll be fine right away.' Lin Lin hung up the phone and turned to leave. Mo Han, who was lying in bed, heard the noise and opened his eyes. He propped up his head with his hand and fainted again.
Mo Han said: "Lin Lin, I need to go to the bathroom. Can you help me up?"
Lin Lin replied: "Okay." She then got up and walked to the bed, ready to help Mo Han with the pillow.

Lin Lin, seeing Mo Han's determination, sat down next to him and said no more. She put her hand on Mo Han's shoulder, her eyes filled with sympathy and understanding. Mo Han looked at Lin Lin, then at the photo, and sighed deeply.

Lin Lin helped Mo Han sit on the bed, then took off his boots. Just as he was about to undress, there was a knock on the door. Lin Lin hurriedly helped Mo Han sit up and grabbed his clothes to cover his chest. Mo Han quickly put on his pants and shoes and walked to the door.
Lin Lin said: "Be careful, you go back to bed, I'll call the guard to bring the urinal in."
Mo Han said: "Ah, no need, I just didn't walk too well. It's okay now."
Lin Lin and Mo Han were dancing in the room, completely unaware that Soldier was watching them from the doorway.
Lin Lin said: "It's here."
Xiao Wang said, 'Miss Lin Lin, I brought some porridge for Secretary Yang.'
Lin Lin walked to the door and said, 'I'll take care of it.'
Soldier said: "Oh, let me, let me, it's hot, I'll do it."
Lin Lin rushed over and said: "Hey, don't put it there." "How could you be so clumsy?" "Get out quickly."
Mo Han replied: "Yes, yes."

Lin Lin was about to go to the kitchen to fetch water when she saw Mo Han at the door. She quickly hid the notebook in her skirt and tried to run away. Mo Han immediately followed her, and Lin Lin had to stop and turn around.
Soldier, who had been waiting at the door for a long time, saw the visitor and stood at the entrance to salute.
Lu Xiao hung up the phone and asked: 'Where did he say he was going?'
Mo Han said: 'Said he was going to buy a gift for Miss Lin Lin.'
Lu Xiao hung up the phone, frowning as he stared at the document on the table. After a moment, he picked up the phone again and said, "Follow that man with the surname Yang immediately."
Mo Han said: "Do you remember the book I asked you to buy last time?" "Yes, I'm fine now." "Room 305 at the Fokai Hotel, tonight at seven." "Don't worry, I'll be on time."
Soldier was about to go out, but saw the rickshaw at the door. He quickly walked out of the house, and saw Mo Han and Lin Lin sitting in the rickshaw. He was about to call out to them, but hesitated.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: Lu Xiao watched Mo Han's retreating figure, slowly turned around, and left the barracks. The sunset cast a golden glow on the wild chrysanthemums, making them even more vibrant.
Mo Han said: "Thank you for taking care of me these days."
Lin Lin said: "The sun sets, but it will rise as usual tomorrow, you say." "Once this pendant shatters, will it ever be the same?"
Mo Han asked: 'Why does it have to shatter?'
Lin Lin said: "In times of chaos, who can guarantee that a tiny pendant won't be destroyed?"
Mo Han said: "Then it should be well protected."

Lin Lin asked: "Could you help me put it on?" Mo Han smiled, took the necklace from Lin Lin's hand, and gently put it around her neck. Then, he leaned on Lin Lin's shoulder like a child, and Lin Lin smiled happily.
Lin Lin said: "For a long time, I felt like the most unfortunate person in the world, always unable to move on from the past, afraid to love again for fear of falling back into a life's abyss."
Mo Han said: "Let the past be the past."
Mo Han said: "You only live once, cherish it."
Lin Lin said: "Thank you for giving me the courage to love again, thank you."
Lin Lin said: "You gave me a gift, can I take you out for a meal?"
Mo Han said: "Today, huh"
Lin Lin said: "Yes, let's go to the Four Joys Restaurant now, to make up for my past mistakes."
Mo Han said: "I can't today, I have an appointment. Let's change it to another day. I'll invite you."
Lin Lin said: "Hmm, who's more important than me?"
Mo Han said: "An old friend, we've grown up together."
Lin Lin asked: "Is it your childhood sweetheart?"
Mo Han asked: "What are you thinking?"
Lin Lin laughed and ran away, Mo Han looked at Lin Lin's departing figure with a heavy heart, feeling a mix of emotions.

The scene shifts, and Mo Han arrives at the front door of the Japanese army's temporary command post. He looks around cautiously to make sure no one is watching, then walks to the door and listens carefully to the noises inside.

The scene shifts, and Mo Han, who has just finished his day's activities, is now heading home. The street is still dark, and Lu Xiao, who has just returned from work, is walking briskly in the same direction. The two of them, each with their own concerns, walk side by side down the street, their paths diverging as they turn into different streets.
Lu Xiao, who was waiting outside the door, heard the noise and looked up. He saw a shadow fleeing in panic. He quickly looked around and then turned to leave.
The scene shifts to the night, where Mo Han is pinned down by Lu Xiao on the ground. Lu Xiao, using Mo Han's uniform, strangles him fiercely.
Mo Han's face was full of sweat, he was panting heavily, his eyes were blurred, he slowly sat down on the ground, his eyes were full of regret and guilt.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Lu Xiao, who was shot in the abdomen, struggled to stand up from the ground, pointed his gun at Mo Han, and said, "You traitor, selling out your own people!"
Mo Han said, "Why is it you, Lu Xiao"
Lu Xiao asked, "Secretary Yang, where are you going in such a hurry?"
Mo Han: "I was just strolling around."
Lu Xiao said, "Do you think I don't know you're heading to room 305 at Fuhkai Hotel?"
Mo Han: "Lu Xiao, you seem well informed."
Lu Xiao said, "Speak up, who are you meeting?"
Mo Han: "Do I need to tell you?"
Lu Xiao, holding a gun at Mo Han, said, "Don't play dumb with me. Are you meeting with the Japanese or the Communists? Speak up."
Mo Han said, "Lu Xiao, I tell you, I am Yang Mohan who serves the Nanjing Government." Lu Xiao burst into laughter upon hearing this.
Lu Xiao said, "A servant of Nanjing Government? Keep dreaming that in your next life." "You don’t need to tell me. We'll go back to the regiment and see."
Mo Han said, "Lu Xiao, why bother? I can tell you, but you can't let Miss Che know."
Lu Xiao asked in confusion: "What, Miss Che?"
Mo Han, with a smile, said, "Actually, I'm going to meet my fiancee."
Lu Xiao said, "Darn, why didn't you say that earlier?" "Having a fiancee is a great thing, a great thing indeed." "Go ahead, go ahead!"
Mo Han said, "Then I'm leaving."
Lu Xiao said, "Go ahead, go ahead," and watched Mo Han's departing figure with a smile.
Mo Han, who was originally heading to the room, stopped and knocked on the door of the room next door. The door opened, and a maid said, "Room service number 21 is here to deliver your newspaper."
Yu Xuan: "Come in."
Mo Han pushed open the door and walked in, closing it behind him. Yu Xuan turned around, and the two looked at each other.
Mo Han: "Yu Xuan."
Mo Han suddenly realized it was Yu Xuan in his arms and said in surprise, "How could it be you, Yu Xuan?"
Yu Xuan said: "Comrade Hong Zichen, I am here to talk to you on behalf of the organization. Comrade Lao Xu has sacrificed, and the organization has transferred me to replace him."

Yu Xuan said: "I will be your superior line, do not come to find me unless in special circumstances," "Your subordinate line remains the same, the owner of Mobaizhai, 4321. Maintain phone contact and do not meet easily unless necessary"
Mo Han said: "Yes, I have the password, what is my next task?"
Yu Xuan said: "Unfortunately, that password is a fake."
Mo Han said, 'Fake? How is that possible? I saw with my own eyes that they were using the story of West Chamber.'
Yu Xuan said, "The moment 4321 relayed to you the password he received, we tried to decode it."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Yu Xuan said, 'I sent telegrams to the Japanese but realized the translations were incorrect, so you must go back immediately and find the correct password.'
Mo Han said, 'Alright.'
Yu Xuan looked at Mo Han with a worried face and asked, 'Are your injuries completely healed?'
Mo Han said, 'I'm fine now.'
Yu Xuan said, 'You need to take good care of yourself.'
Mo Han said, "So did I. I thought I would never see you again in this lifetime."
Yu Xuan said, 'I forbid you to talk like that.'
Mo Han said: "From the day I went north, I never expected to return alive."
Mo Han said, 'You know the risky nature of our undercover work; one day you're alive and kicking, and the next you could be a charred corpse.'
Mo Han, with his back to Yu Xuan, tried hard to control his emotions. Yu Xuan, standing behind him, could no longer cry, only staring at Mo Han's back with wide eyes.
Mo Han said, "I never thought I'd have the chance to give this to you." Mo Han took out a necklace and handed it to Yu Xuan, who was touched and surprised. Mo Han then pulled Yu Xuan into his arms.
Mo Han said, "Yu Xuan, thought of so much to say but suddenly found herself at a loss for words."
Yu Xuan asked, "Do you feel the burden is too much to bear alone?"
Mo Han said, "Rest assured, I will definitely complete the mission the organization has entrusted to me."
Yu Xuan said, 'You must return safely, promise me that.'
Mo Han said, "It's getting late, I should go back now." "Take care!"
Yu Xuan stopped and said, "Wait." Yu Xuan turned around and faced Mo Han, saying, "Take care." Yu Xuan's words were full of emotion, and Mo Han looked at her with a face full of tenderness.
Yu Xuan, with a heavy heart, looked at Mo Han, but Mo Han avoided her gaze and left without a word.
Mo Han, who was hiding behind a palm tree, slowly walked out and saw Che Linlin standing at the door. He walked towards Che Linlin, and Che Linlin walked towards him.
Mo Han, who had been waiting at the door for a long time, saw Che Linlin and quickly approached, clasping his hands in greeting and saying, 'Linlin, what are you doing here?'
Che Linlin asked, "Where is your fiancée? I want to meet her."
Mo Han said, 'What are you talking about?'
Che Linlin said, 'Yang Mohan, don't play dumb with me. I always thought you were different from other men, a man of your word who doesn't lie.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Che Linlin said: "Strange, then where have I seen you before?"
Yang Muchen said, 'Could it be in a dream?'
Che Linlin said, "In a dream."
Yang Muchen asked, 'Have you ever read Tang Xianzu's 'The Peony Pavilion', Miss Che Linlin?'
Che Linlin said, "Mr. Yang Muchen is familiar with it?"
Yang Muchen said, "A bit." "'Love arises without a reason, it deepens once it starts. The living can die, the dead can live, feelings in dreams do not have to be unreal.'"
Che Linlin said, "Mr. Yang Muchen knows a lot about 'The Peony Pavilion.'"
Che Zhenshan said, 'Mr. Yang Muchen is a top student from Huangpu Academy, isn't he?'
Yang Muchen said, "You're too kind, Colonel. I just enjoyed listening to operas since childhood. After graduating from Huangpu, I went to Japan."
Che Linlin said, "Mr. Yang Muchen, you have been to Japan?"
Yang Muchen said, "Yes, I studied in Japan. Have you been there too, Miss Che Linlin?"
Che Linlin asked, "What do you think of Japan, Mr. Yang Muchen?"

Yang Muchen: "Japan, it's hard to explain in a few words..." "The Mukden Incident, the fall of the Three Northeastern Provinces, their crimes are unforgivable." "However, not every Japanese person is bad, and....' Recently, our leaders are not fully committed to resisting Japan." "They believe in 'pacifying internal turmoil before dealing with external aggression.' Surely you have heard of this, Colonel."
Yang Muchen said, "So from this perspective, whether Japan is good or bad has nothing to do with us. Our greatest enemy at present is the Communist Party."

Yang Muchen smiled and said, "Come, Miss Che Linlin, let's drink to that." Yang Muchen picked up the wine glass, Che Zhenshan watched him warily. Yang Muchen clinked glasses with everyone, but his expression was tense.
Che Zhenshan said, 'Mr. Yang Muchen knows nothing at all. They say ignorance is no sin.'
Che Linlin said, 'Whether he knows or not doesn't matter. What matters is that he's a heartless Japanese lackey.'

Che Zhenshan said, 'He is just conveying the will of his superiors.' 'A person cannot always control their life in this world, can't your father be the same way?' 'Che Linlin, I think that Mr. Yang Muchen is a very talented man.' 'And a favorite of Director Bai, his future is limitless.'
Che Linlin said, 'What does that have to do with me?'
Che Zhenshan said, "Che Linlin, you're not young anymore. You can't live in the past forever. You need to think about yourself. After all, we still have to live, don't we?"
Che Linlin said, 'My affairs are none of your business.'
Che Zhenshan said, 'Why are you so stubborn?' 'I'm just looking out for you.'
Che Linlin stood up and said, 'If you truly care for me, you would immediately drive that Mr. Yang away for me.'
Che Zhenshan said, 'He is sent by Nanjing, how dare I drive him away?'
Che Linlin hesitated and said, "That..."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Lin Lin said: 'But I was wrong' 'Why did you hide that you have a fiancée' 'Why didn't you tell me earlier' 'You can say directly if you don't like me' 'I didn't force you' 'You shouldn't lie to me'
Lin Lin, with tears in her eyes, wiped them away and said: "I don't need your gratitude"
Mo Han shouted: 'Lin Lin! Lin Lin!' Lin Lin heard the shout, turned around, and saw Mo Han clutching his chest, gasping for air.
Lin Lin, covering her nose in pain, said, 'Yang Mo Han, we are now even. You leave immediately, leave 101 Group immediately. I never want to see you again.'
Mo Han chased after Lin Lin, shouting, 'Lin Lin, Lin Lin!'
Lin Lin said, 'Let me go! Let me go!'
Lin Lin said: "Why are you doing this" "Why are you doing this"
Mo Han said: 'Things are not what you think'
Mo Han said: "Follow me, trust me"

Lin Lin was stunned, her eyes wide open, unable to believe that Mo Han had changed so drastically. Mo Han, on the other hand, looked at Lin Lin with pity, his eyes filled with guilt. He reached out to touch Lin Lin's face, his expression pained.
Lin Lin, with tears in her eyes, looked at Mo Han, who was holding her. She was about to speak, but then she heard the sound of a door closing.
The two entered the room, and Lin Lin asked, 'Where is the person'?

Mo Han said: "Yeah, how is it gone". Lin Lin did not answer, but pulled open the door curtain and walked out. Mo Han followed her and saw that the balcony was empty. He turned back to look at Lin Lin.
Lin Lin said: 'You are lying to me'
Mo Han said: "No, he was here just now" "Look, the light is still on" "I really didn't lie to you" "I really met with the fellow villagers" "I want to sell the tobacco soil"
Lin Lin said: 'Then why did you lie to Lu Xiao'

Mo Han said: "I know he likes you" "So I dare not offend him" "You also know that the Nanjing government just issued last month" "Temporary Regulations on the Prohibition of Smoking and Drugs" "If Lu Xiao knows that I sell tobacco" "I"
Mo Han said: "I am telling the truth"
Mo Han asked: "What's wrong"?
Lin Lin said: "Nothing, let's go."
Lin Lin stormed out of the room in a rage, leaving Mo Han standing there, puzzled.
Lu Xiao said: "Commander, that kid surnamed Yang is too out of line, he has a woman at home and still wants to take advantage of Lin Lin, what the hell is this."
Lu Xiao asked: "How do you know" "Have you been to his house"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: Group leader said: "Still the woman who has seen him."
Lu Xiao said: 'No, that Yang kid told me himself.'
Group leader said: "Since you haven’t seen it with your own eyes, is there any conclusive evidence? Merely on Mo Han's word, you're so readily convinced. Isn’t that a bit improper?"
Lu Xiao said: 'Group leader, why do you always side with him?'

Group leader said: "Whether I am siding with him or doing this for Lin Lin, you should be clear in your heart. Ever since Mo Han arrived, look how happy Lin Lin has been. It’s as if we’re back to our childhood days. That’s more important than anything."
Lu Xiao said: 'Ever since that Yang guy came, I haven’t had a single good day.'
Group leader said: 'Lu Xiao, a soldier should be competing on the battlefield, not competing in jealousy. Look at yourself.'
The scene shifts to Mo Han's room, where he is sitting on the sofa, absent-mindedly playing with a lighter.

Mo Han said: 'What’s wrong with you, not a word for so long? You must be bothered by something, you.' Mo Han stood up, poured a glass of water for Lin Lin, and continued: 'You are always so suspicious, always overthinking.'
Mo Han, who was drinking, suddenly choked on the wine and fell asleep instantly.
Mo Han said: 'Lin Lin, life is short. Who doesn’t want to fall in love passionately, who doesn’t want to spend a lifetime with the one they love?'

Mo Han continued: 'But we happen to live in such times, having today doesn’t guarantee tomorrow. We can hardly ensure our own lives, who would dare to touch love so lightly? Maybe right now, outside the window, someone is aiming a gun at me.'
Lu Xiao walked in with two soldiers, looked at Mo Han, and said: 'See, what did I say, confess in front of Lin Lin. Did you go on a date with your fiancée that day or not? Speak.'

Mo Han said: 'What if I tell you no, would you believe me?' Mo Han was very arrogant, and Lu Xiao was very angry. He walked over to Mo Han, grabbed his collar, and said, 'I'm the commander here, you're just a platoon leader.'

Lu Xiao said: "You’ve got quite a stiff mouth, huh? If not the fiancée, then who are you sneaking around meeting with? The Communist Party? Do you dare admit it? If you dare, I’ve got the guts to put a bullet in you, right here."
Mo Han said: 'Lu Xiao, why should I admit anything to you, what are you to decide?'
The scene shifts to the living room, where Lin Lin is tied to a chair. Group leader orders his subordinates: "Brothers, beat him to death for me."
Lin Lin, who was sitting on the sofa, suddenly stood up, pointed a gun at the military police, and said: 'Get out.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.text: Lu Xiao, with a face full of anger, said: "Lin Lin, he is a man engaged to be married, what are you to him anyway?"
Lin Lin angrily said: "Even if I were a piece of rotten meat, I wouldn't let a fly like you linger on me. Get out."
Lu Xiao said: "Fine, Yang. You're lucky this time. We'll see about that. Let's go."
Lin Lin, with tears in her eyes, looked at Lu Xiao on the ground, then at the gun in her hand, and finally, she collapsed onto Lu Xiao's body, wailing uncontrollably.

In the room, Mo Han was sleeping soundly on the bed. He suddenly woke up, turned over, and found that Lin Lin's bed was already empty. He immediately got up to look around the room, but Lin Lin was nowhere to be seen.
Mo Han, who was lying next to Lin Lin, looked at her and slowly sat up. He reached out and held Lin Lin's hand, then turned and looked behind him.
Mo Han, who was sitting on the edge of the bed, turned his head to look at Lin Lin, then got up and walked to the other side.
Mo Han, who was sitting on the bed, turned around, picked up the coat hanging on the chair, and left.
Mo Han searched the sofa and found a playing card under a piece of clothing.

Mo Han, who was using the toilet, heard the noise and quickly pulled up his pants. He took the book out of his bag and saw that it was a manual on agricultural science. He flipped through a few pages and realized that there was a map in the middle of the book.

Mo Han, who was reading a book in the restroom, heard the commotion outside and became alert. He turned his head to look at the door, then continued reading. The next second, he seemed to have discovered something, quickly flipping through the book in his hand.
Lin Lin was sleeping soundly in the room. Mo Han came in, sat on the chair by the bed, and took off his hat. Lin Lin slowly opened her eyes and looked at Mo Han.
Mo Han looked around and said: "I'm looking for clothes."
Lin Lin said: "Looking for clothes? They're in the bathroom. You were sick last night, I was exhausted."
Mo Han said: "Then I'll be going back first." He glanced at Lin Lin, then turned and left.
Lu Xiao said: "Please connect me to 4321". After hanging up, Lu Xiao continued to practice: "Please connect me to 4321 once more"
Lu Xiao, with a frown, slowly put down the phone. He had been deceived and his anger had cooled down. He sighed, his hand still on the phone, his face full of disappointment.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: Hong Zichen hung up the phone, his face showing a mix of surprise and delight.
Hong Zichen arrived at the recruitment office, saw the words 'no recruitment' on the notice, and angrily knocked on the door.
Hong Zichen, who had been waiting outside for a long time, was almost frozen. He quickly moved to the window to observe the situation inside.
Hong Zichen, who was eavesdropping by the pillar, heard the conversation between Man and the short soldier, stood up, and looked at Man with a smile.
Hong Zichen said: "Old Xu, I'm here."
Man said: "Hong Zichen, come on in."
Man said, 'Friend, we've met before, but I remember, you weren't dressed like this at the time.'
Hong Zichen said, "You've got the wrong person."
Man said, 'Friend, don't go, let's have a chat.' 'Friend, friend, don't leave.' 'Friend, watch out.' 'Friend, hold up.'
Hong Zichen fired a shot into the sky, and the crowd instantly dispersed.
Man smiled and aimed the gun at Hong Zichen. Hong Zichen, with a smile, pulled the trigger. The bullet passed through Man's left arm, and he fell backward.
Man said, "Pal, if I reveal your identity, you know what fate awaits you."
Hong Zichen put away his gun and said, 'Bro, you and I, we're cut from the same cloth.'
Man asked in confusion, "What do you mean?"
Hong Zichen said, "It's all about money in the end. I'm just doing some business with the Communists."
Man nodded and said, "Not bad"

Hong Zichen said: 'Bro, in this war between the Nationalists and Communists, who knows who will win. We profiteers shouldn’t be at odds. What's more, revealing each other's identities benefits neither of us. Let's do this instead: you don't disclose my identity, and I'll give you a sum of money. As for your identity, I'll keep quiet, but you'll need to provide me with information, and I'll pay you extra for it. How about that?'
Hong Zichen's sudden action left Man somewhat at a loss, but he still maintained composure and looked at Hong Zichen with a smile.
Man handed over the gun and said, "Here."

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: The two walked to the pavilion, and Lin Chunhu said, 'I, no, no, no, no, the turtle farming cooperative is just getting started, I have a lot of work to do.'

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: Zhang Dong said, 'So, can the two of you try to understand each other a bit?'

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: The father said, 'You were still raised by me. You're siding with outsiders, eh? Your mother has gone on a trip to Hong Kong. Wait until she comes back to see how she deals with you.'

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: Zhang Xi said: "We know what's going on, right?"

Mother continued: "But Eldest Brother adamantly refused. He said if she moved in, the two brothers would no longer look after us."
Chun Hu said: "Living together is no big deal."

Eldest Brother said: "Of course not" "My dad's health is poor" "My mom just had surgery last year" "If both of them live in my house" "Food, drinks, medical expenses, all would be on me alone. How can I afford it? And he wouldn't help."
Second Brother said: "What, I don't help? Who paid the twenty thousand yuan hospital fee for mom's surgery last year?"

Chun Hu said: "Stop arguing, aren't you ashamed? This is about supporting your parents, not contracting a turtle pond. Genwang, Genxing, I initially agreed to let you join our turtle farming cooperative, but now, I need to reconsider."

Chun Hu said: "If you don't support your parents, it means you have no character. And people without character are not welcome in our cooperative. When we'll allow you to join depends on your future conduct, understood?"
Old Father said: "Chun Hu, in the future, can my old wife and I still live together?"

Chun Hu said: "Don't worry" "This agreement is not valid" "There are laws in the country" "Just because you signed an agreement to separately support each parent" "doesn't mean you only take care of your own" "If you don't look after them," "it constitutes the crime of abandonment." "Even if you take it to court," "the judge will likely side with me." "Alright," "regarding the issue of supporting parents," "don't just think about how much money you are spending."

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: Man said, "Think about the old man's wishes, take good care of the old man's health, that's settled then, the two old men will live together, as for the support payments, the two brothers will split them equally."
The next day, a calf was born.
Old Secretary and Mayor Yang greeted each other enthusiastically.
Mayor Yang said: "I heard your blood pressure has been a bit high recently. You really need to take care of yourself."
Old Secretary said: "It's a minor issue, no big deal, no big deal."
Old Secretary said: "Please, please, please, come on in."
Mayor Yang said: "Please, please, I've come today, mainly to prepare for the re-election of our Camellia Village Party organization, to get a sense of things."
Man in Blue Clothes asked Mayor Yang: "Mayor Yang, are there any new policies for this year's election?"

Mayor Yang said: "This year's village Party organization election is not just the business of the Party members. We're implementing a system of two nominations and one election. Candidates are nominated by both Party members and the public. The entire village can participate."
Man in Gray Clothes said: "What if some people are away all year, working or doing business and can't come back, how can they be recommended then?"
Mayor Yang said: "Public recommendation cannot be delegated," "We will try our best to inform them," "Those who can come back should come back," "Those who can't," "will have to forgo this right"
Old Secretary said: "Alright Mayor Yang, let's sit inside."
Mayor Yang said: "Alright, alright, let's go"
Seated Woman said: "From what you're saying, my Xian Gen isn't a Party member, so he has no chance of becoming the village Party Secretary?"
Woman in Black Clothes said: "Your Xian Gen, even if he were a Party member, he still wouldn't stand a chance."
Seated Woman asked: "Why?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "I'm not joking, hey, look here, the problem with your illegal house construction last year for the wedding, that's no small matter, so even if your Xian Gen were elected, he would be removed from office."
Seated Woman asked in confusion: "Is it that serious?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "Of course, anyone who was released from prison less than five years ago, violated family planning policies, or didn't fulfill their duties for a long time, is disqualified."

Woman in White Clothes said: "Hey, if you count it this way, there aren't many qualified people in our village. My Fang Sheng is one. But on the other hand, our nursery business has been growing, he doesn't even have time to catch a breath. Even if he were elected, he wouldn't care."
Seated Woman said: "Oh, you're boasting"

The scene shifts to a small path in the mountains, where a woman in sportswear is running wildly. She is followed by a man in suit and leather shoes, who is holding a camera and filming her. The man shouts: "Xiao Bao, hurry up"
Man in Blue Clothes said: "Alright, got it"
Seated Woman asked: "Is it heavy?"
Man in Blue Clothes said: "Not heavy"
The woman says: "If it's not heavy, then move faster"
Man in Blue Clothes replied: "I'm catching up"

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: The car continued to drive on the mountain road.

The car drove along the winding mountain road, with the chirping of birds and the sound of flowing water accompanying the journey. The vehicle passed through the narrow path and slowly stopped at the entrance of a village.
The car arrived at the village entrance of the ecological park, and the large characters 'Ecological Park' appeared on the screen.

The four brothers saw Zhang Dong getting out of the car and excitedly surrounded him, saying, "Here he comes," "Big brother, big brother," "Watch your step, be careful, slow down," "Big brother, slow down," "You're finally back big brother," "Let's go." The four brothers helped Zhang Dong get out of the car and said, "Big brother, you seem very energetic," "Let's go, let's go," "Watch your step."
The scene shifts to a tea garden, where a group of middle-aged women are sitting around a table. One lady wearing a scarf asks, "Who is this rich man?"
The woman said, "Oh, that’s our village chief Zhang Dong. You don’t recognize him?"
The woman in blue said, "She's only been married a few months." "The Village Chief spends most of his time in Jiangxi." "Of course, she wouldn't recognize him."

The woman continued, "If you talk about our village, his family has the most brothers. I remember when they were little, all five of them would gang up in a fight. Everyone was afraid of them. They are very influential now."
The middle-aged Zhang Dong said, "The oldest Zhang Dong is the village chief" "He doesn’t manage the village affairs" "Spends most of his time in Jiangxi doing nursery business"
The woman continued, "The second brother, Zhang Xi, is a contractor. Remember the road repair we had in our village? It was contracted to him."
The woman continued, "The third brother, Zhang Nan, is the security director of the village. He owes so much money to the small store that he could write a book about it."
The woman with short hair said, "The fourth brother, Zhang Bei, is the factory director of the flour mill. The fifth brother, Zhang Zhong, is a big local ruffian in the village."
The woman in green clothes said, "East, West, South, North, Central, isn't this a full mahjong hand?"
The woman continued, "Let me tell you, do you know why he came back from Jiangxi at this time?"
The woman in the middle asked, "Why?"
The woman with curly hair said, "For Secretary selection."
The woman in blue said, "Oh, that makes sense."
The next day, the sun was shining brightly, and the birds were chirping. A group of people, including Zhang Dong, were walking on a small bridge in the mountains.
The scene shifts to the outside of the hall, where the uncle says, "Come come come." "Zhang Dong, big brother, you must be tired from this trip."
Zhang Dong asked, "Anything happened in the village during the half-year I was away?"
Zhang Dong said, "Brother, these are the materials prepared by the brothers. Come, have a look. Sit down."
The man said, "Brother, our cousin Zhang Baoliang has now surpassed the Sapium Wood King Zhang Baotang and has become the new richest man in our village."

The man in the red shirt said, "The assistant village chief Liu Mengting has organized some kind of environmental volunteer team. It seems that she has some big opinions about the water quality of the Da Xi River outside our village."
Zhang Dong said, 'Just a bunch of kids messing around.'
The man with the gold chain said, "Big brother."

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Zhang Xiaobao said: "Liu Mengting, this place has a beautiful view, how about I take a photo for you?"
Zhang Xiaobao: "Good, sit here, sit, sit well, one, two, three, hmm, looks good."
Zhang Xiaobao: "Liu Mengting, didn’t you just go into town a couple of days ago? Why are you heading to the city again?"

Liu Mengting said, 'Old Lady He is almost out of medicine, Uncle Lin needs to get a senior's card, his daughter needs to apply for a birth permit, and then there's Old Lady Song, who wants me to bring a jar of pickles to her son in the city. Ah, I'm too busy to keep up.'
Zhang Xiaobao said, "Village assistant, I think you're just a runner and jack of all trades."
Liu Mengting said: "Nonsense, what I do is all about serving our villagers, unlike you, all talk no action."
Zhang Xiaobao said, "How have I been all talk no action?"
Liu Mengting said: "You’ve been talking about organizing a beautiful countryside photography exhibition for a while now, but there's been no movement on it yet."
Zhang Xiaobao: "Who says?" "The photos are all ready, look." "Not bad, right?" "Now, my dad is helping me find a venue, as soon as the venue is secured, the exhibition will start."
Liu Mengting said: "Your dad, your dad, your dad, always bringing up your dad, when will you manage to do something on your own?"
Liu Mengting took a few steps, jumped up, and ran away laughing.
Zhang Xiaobao asked: "Liu Mengting, you’re always so busy, do you have any plans for the future?"

Liu Mengting continued: "My plan is to manage our village's water environment well," "make our village a national ecological demonstration village," "and then," "protect our village's ancient buildings," "and also," "to develop our village's cultural tourism resources heavily," "then let people from all over the country come visit our village."
Zhang Xiaobao asked, "And then?"
Liu Mengting said: "And then, if I get the chance, I would like to go back to school to continue studying my major."
Zhang Xiaobao: "Still studying, huh?" "You’ll be an old maid by the time you're done, then how will you marry me?"
Liu Mengting said: "Stop it."

Zhang Xiaobao said, "Hey, Liu Mengting, actually I have my plans too. You know, my dad just bought me a car recently, right? He said he's going to buy me a house too." " Seeing as we’re both not so young anymore, shouldn’t we..."

Liu Mengting: "Hey, why are you walking so slow?" "Old Lady He is waiting for us at home, let's move faster." Zhang Xiaobao followed behind Liu Mengting, the two walked through the tea garden and returned to the village. The scene changed, an old man was sitting on a wooden chair in a narrow alley, with three lanterns hanging in front of his house.
Liu Mengting poured the water into the teapot, then picked up the teapot and poured the water into the teapot.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Liu Mengting went to the kitchen, brought the medicine back to the room, and said to Auntie He, "Auntie He, this is the newly bought medicine. It's more effective than the last one. You need to take it once a day. Don't forget."
Liu Mengting said, "Okay, I got it!"
Zhang Xiaobao, who was taking photos, saw Chun Hu and said with a smile, "Hey, Chun Hu bro, what a coincidence, you're here too."
Chun Hu: "Yes, Auntie He hasn't been well, so I brought a turtle I raised myself to help Auntie He regain strength."
Zhang Xiaobao: "Ah, alright."
Liu Mengting said: "Chun Hu bro, please have a seat!"
Chun Hu said: "Alright, alright, Auntie He."
Liu Mengting: "Yes."
Chun Hu said: "Look, this turtle is so fresh!" "Auntie He, are you feeling any better?"
Auntie He said: "Much better!"
Chun Hu: "That's good to hear, it's great that you're recovering!"

Auntie He said: "Thank you, Chun Hu, you're such a good person. You never forget us old folks, even during holidays you give us red envelopes. Over the past few years, I can't even count how many turtles I've received from you."

The broadcast announced: "Notice for the election of the Camellia Village Party Organization. According to the requirements of the higher-level party organization, our village will elect the next committee members of the Party Organization."
Bao Liang was so frightened that he didn't know what to do for a moment, Director laughed and said, "Bao Liang ah."
Bao Liang quickly said: "Hey, hey, hey."
Director said: "You didn't need to bring a gift when you came. Why are you being so polite?"
Bao Liang said: "Director, this is the pig face we cured ourselves at home. You can't find this kind of stuff in Jiangxi."
Director said: "Old Five."
Director said: "Oh."
Director said: "Take it to the kitchen and prepare it well. Let's have it for lunch."
Zhang Xiaobao extended his hands and said: "Okay."
Director said: "Prepare a good bottle of wine, so I can have a drink with Bao Liang."
Director quickly says: "Alright alright alright."
Director said, "Ah, Bao Liang."
Bao Liang said: "Hey."
Director asked, "How's business in the first half of the year?"
Bao Liang: "Not too great, business is tough these days."
Director said: "You're being humble, aren't you? You've always been the richest person in our village."
Bao Liang: "Oh, richest in the village? I'm barely scraping by. For instance, I wanted to expand my pig farm."
Director said: "That's a good thing!"

Bao Liang said: "But dealing with the land isn't easy. The two households living there refuse to move no matter what, causing a big fuss. Today, I'm hoping you, Director, can put in a good word and help my cousin out."
Director said, "Bao Liang ah."
Bao Liang said, "Oh."
Director said, "This timing isn't right."
Bao Liang said: "Ah?"
Director said: "We're in the middle of the village organization election, and since you're my cousin, if I speak up for you, people will listen."
Director said: "Those with ulterior motives will accuse me of favoritism."
Bao Liang said: "Hey, in our village, with the surname Zhang, going back three generations, aren't we all relatives? Are you really afraid of that?"
Director asked: "Do you have some sort of leverage that they're holding against you?"
Bao Liang, puzzled, asked, "Leverage? How could that be?" "My pig farm has all the proper paperwork."
